Name: ESGProtection_P01_1617RtoPost16
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim Post16_AP_Prov As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F601_ESGProtection_Post16onlyAP
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =     Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream
    Dim OpeningDate As Date =       Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim NOR35 As Decimal =          Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P35_1617_BaseNOR_ESGProt
    Dim NOR35b As Decimal =         Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P35b_1617_BaseNOR_ESGProtincHN
    Dim HNPlaces As Decimal =       [DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2016/17.APT.APT_Local_factors_dataset.APT_Local_factors_dataset.Total_number_of_High_Needs_places_in_2015/16]
    Dim NOR18 As Decimal =          Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_NOR:NOR_AY201617_Report.P18_NOR_HNP_HN_Pre16
    Dim NOR19 As Decimal =          Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_NOR:NOR_AY201617_Report.P19_NOR_HNP_AP_Pre16
    Dim NOR20 As Decimal =          Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_NOR:NOR_AY201617_Report.P20_NOR_HNP_Hosp_Pl
    Dim TotalESGNOR As Decimal =    999 
    Dim NORReceptionUplift As Decimal = 999  
    Dim NurseryNOR As Decimal =     999             
          
If acadfilter = 1 Then

    If Post16_AP_Prov = 1 Then 
    
        result = NOR35

    Else 

        If OpeningDate > "31 March 2016" And OpeningDate < "01 April 2017" THEN                  
        
            result = ((NOR35b - HNPlaces) + (NOR18 + NOR19 + NOR20))

        ELSE

            If  OpeningDate > "31 March 2017" And OpeningDate < "01 September 2017" THEN

                result = (TotalESGNOR + NORReceptionUplift - NurseryNOR)

            ELSE         
   
                    result = NOR35b 
                
            End If 
        
        End If 
        
    End If     

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If 

    Return result
    
End Function

    Dim OpenDate As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened

If acadfilter = 1 Then 

    If OpenDate > "31 March 2017" And OpenDate < "01 September 2017" THEN

    Else

    End If 

Else

End If     

    Return result 
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P05a_Mainstream_Ratio
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal =     Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream
    Dim Post16APFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F601_ESGProtection_Post16onlyAP
    Dim NORHNPHosp As Decimal =     Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_NOR:NOR_AY201617_Report.P20_NOR_HNP_Hosp_Pl
    Dim NORP16HN As Decimal =       Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_NOR:NOR_AY201617_Report.P21b_NOR_P16_HN
    Dim NORP16 As Decimal =         Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_NOR:NOR_AY201617_Report.P21_NOR_P16
    Dim NORHNPHNPre16 As Decimal =  Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_NOR:NOR_AY201617_Report.P18_NOR_HNP_HN_Pre16
    Dim NORHNPAPPre16 As Decimal =  Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_NOR:NOR_AY201617_Report.P19_NOR_HNP_AP_Pre16 
    
If acadfilter = 1 Then 

        If Post16APFilter = 1 Then 
            result = (NORP16 / (NORP16 + NORHNPAPPre16 + NORHNPHNPre16 + NORHNPHosp + NORP16HN)) 

        ELSE

            result = 1
    
        End If 

Else 
    
    exclude(rid)
    
End If     
    
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P08_1617MFG
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim OpeningDate As Date =                   Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim MFG_TotalOverallNetAdj As Decimal =     Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_MFG:MFG_AY201617_Report.P65_TotalOverallNetAdj
    Dim MFG_IYNetAdjFromAPT As Decimal =        Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_MFG:MFG_AY201617_Report.P61_IYNetAdjFromAPT
    Dim MFG_NORfromAPT As Decimal =             Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_MFG:MFG_AY201617_Report.P55_NORfromAPT 
    Dim MFG_IY1617AdjNOR As Decimal =           Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_MFG:MFG_AY201617_Report.P60_IY1617AdjNOR
    Dim MFG_Funding As Decimal =                999 
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =                 Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream
    
    print(OpeningDate,"OpeningDate",rid)
    print(MFG_TotalOverallNetAdj,"MFG1617IYOfullyear",rid)
    print(MFG_IYNetAdjFromAPT,"MFG1617InYearAdjust",rid)
    print(MFG_NORfromAPT,"NORfromAPT",rid)
    print(MFG_IY1617AdjNOR,"AdjustNOR",rid)
    print(acadfilter,"Acadfilter",rid)
    
If acadfilter = 1 Then 

    If OpeningDate < "01 April 2016" THEN   

        result = MFG_TotalOverallNetAdj    
    
    Else    

        If OpeningDate > "31 March 2016" And OpeningDate < "31 March 2017" THEN
            
            result = MFG_IYNetAdjFromAPT * MFG_IY1617AdjNOR / MFG_NORfromAPT
        
        Else

            If OpeningDate > "31 March 2017" And OpeningDate < "01 September 2017" THEN

                result = MFG_Funding
    
            Else 
            
                exclude(rid)

            End If 

        End If
    
    End If     

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If
                                                   
    Return result

End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P10_1617ESGProt_AP
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream
    Dim APFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F601_ESGProtection_Post16onlyAP
    
    Dim ESG_MainstreamProtection As Decimal =   Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_ESGProtection:Data_Output.P32_ESG_MainstreamProtection
    Dim SpHospESGProtection As Decimal =        Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_ESGProtection:Data_Output.P72_SpHospESGProtection
    Dim APESGProtection As Decimal =            Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_ESGProtection:Data_Output.P73_APESGProtection
    Dim OutcomeAdjTotal As Decimal =            DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2016/17.EFA_Adjustments.EFA_Adjustments.ESG_protection_outcome_adjustment_total
    Dim ESGP_MainstreamRatio As Decimal =       Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P05a_Mainstream_Ratio
    Dim Sum As Decimal = ESG_MainstreamProtection + SpHospESGProtection + APESGProtection + OutcomeAdjTotal
    Dim Prov_SubType As String = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype


 
Print(acadFilter, "AcadFilter", rid)
Print(APFilter, "APFilter", rid)
Print(ESGP_MainstreamRatio, "Ratio", rid)
Print(Sum, "Sum", rid)

If acadfilter = 1 then

        If APFilter = 1 Then 
        
            result = ESGP_MainstreamRatio * Sum

        Else 

            result = Sum
                                                                                                                   
        End If  

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If
    
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P13_1617Post16ExlBursary
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim Allocation1619 As Decimal = Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_Post16:Post16_AY201617_Report.P08_1619Allocation
    Dim PostApril_Allocation16to19 As Decimal = 999
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =     Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream   

    Dim ConvertDate As Date =       Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Convert_Date
    Dim OpenDate As Date =          Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim DateUsed As Date =          "1 September 2017"
    Dim DaysOpen1617 As Decimal =   Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_GlobalVariables:Data_Output_Variables.P27_DaysOpen
    Dim MonthsOpen1617 As Decimal = 0  
    Dim MonthsUsed As Decimal =     0 
    
If ConvertDate >= OpenDate Then 
    DateUsed = ConvertDate
Else 
    DateUsed = OpenDate
End If 

MonthsOpen1617 = DateDiff("m", DateUsed, "1 September 2017")

If acadfilter = 1 Then

        If OpenDate > "31 March 2017" And OpenDate < "01 September 2017" THEN
    
            result = PostApril_Allocation16to19 / MonthsOpen1617 * 12
        
        ELSE
           
           If MonthsOpen1617 < 12 THEN
                
                result = (Allocation1619 / MonthsOpen1617 * 12)
    
           ELSE            
    
                result = Allocation1619  
        
           End If 
            
        End If 
 
 Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If
    
    Return result

End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P14_1617AdjustUnitVal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim ESGP_NORlessHN As Decimal =         Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P02_1617NORlessHN
    Dim ESGP_RtoPost16 As Decimal =         Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P01_1617RtoPost16
    Dim ESGP_SBS As Decimal =               Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P07_1617SBS
    Dim ESGP_MFG As Decimal =               Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P08_1617MFG
    Dim ESGP_ESGRecalc As Decimal =         Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P09_1617ESGRecalc
    Dim ESGP_AllocProt As Decimal =         Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P10_1617ESGProt_AP
    Dim ESGP_Post16ExlBursary As Decimal =  Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P13_1617Post16ExlBursary
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =             Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream

If acadfilter = 1 Then 
              
    If ESGP_RtoPost16 = 0 AND ESGP_NORlessHN = 0 THEN    

        result = 0

    ELSE
            
        result = ((ESGP_SBS + ESGP_MFG + ESGP_Post16ExlBursary) / ESGP_NORlessHN) + ((ESGP_ESGRecalc + ESGP_AllocProt) / ESGP_RtoPost16)
       
    End If 
 
Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If

    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P17_1718AdjustReductUnitVal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim ESGP_ESGRateChange As Decimal = Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P15_ESGRateChange
    Dim ESGP_AllocProt As Decimal = Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P10_1617ESGProt_AP
    Dim ESGP_RtoPost16 As Decimal = Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P03_1718RtoPost16
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream
    
If acadfilter = 1 Then     
     
    If ESGP_RtoPost16 = 0 THEN
        
        result = 0
    
    ELSE
            
        result = ESGP_ESGRateChange + ((ESGP_AllocProt * -1) / ESGP_RtoPost16)
    
    End If 

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If
    
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P27_FundingRate1
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim ESGP_FundingRate As Decimal =   Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P19_1617FundingRate
    Dim ESGP_TaperCond1 As Decimal =    Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P20_TaperCond1
    Dim ESGP_TaperThresh1 As Decimal =  Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P21_TaperThresh1
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =         Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream
    Dim Minimum As Decimal =            0

If acadfilter = 1 Then 

    If ESGP_FundingRate = 0 THEN
        
        result = 0

    ELSE

        If ESGP_TaperThresh1 > ESGP_FundingRate Then 
            Minimum = ESGP_FundingRate
        Else 
            Minimum = ESGP_TaperThresh1
        End If 
        
        Result = -1 * ( Minimum / ESGP_FundingRate) * ESGP_TaperCond1
    
    End If 

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If

    Return result

End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P28_FundingRate2
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim ESGP_FundingRate As Decimal =   Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P19_1617FundingRate
    Dim ESGP_TaperThresh1 As Decimal =  Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P21_TaperThresh1
    Dim ESGP_TaperCond2 As Decimal =    Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P22_TaperCond2
    Dim ESGP_TaperThresh2 As Decimal =  Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P23_TaperThresh2
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =         Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream
    Dim Minimum As Decimal = 0 

If acadfilter = 1 Then 

    If ESGP_FundingRate = 0 THEN

        result = 0

    ELSE

        If (ESGP_TaperThresh2 - ESGP_TaperThresh1) > (ESGP_FundingRate - ESGP_TaperThresh1) Then 
            
            Minimum = ESGP_FundingRate - ESGP_TaperThresh1
            
        Else 

            Minimum = ESGP_TaperThresh2 - ESGP_TaperThresh1
        
        End If 

        result = -1 * (Minimum / ESGP_FundingRate) * ESGP_TaperCond2  
    
    End If 

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If

    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P29_FundingRate3
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim ESGP_FundingRate As Decimal =   Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P19_1617FundingRate
    Dim ESGP_TaperThresh2 As Decimal =  Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P23_TaperThresh2
    Dim ESGP_TaperCond3 As Decimal =    Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P24_TaperCond3
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =         Products.1718_Global_Variables.F602_ESGProtection_Mainstream
    Dim Maximum As Decimal =            0

If acadfilter = 1 Then 

    If ESGP_FundingRate = 0 THEN

        result = 0

    ELSE
    
        If 0 > (ESGP_FundingRate - ESGP_TaperThresh2) Then 
            
            Maximum  = 0
        
        Else 
            
            Maximum = (ESGP_FundingRate - ESGP_TaperThresh2) 
        
        End If 

        result = -1 * (Maximum / ESGP_FundingRate) * ESGP_TaperCond3
        'result = -1 * (Math.Max(0, ESGP_FundingRate - ESGP_TaperThresh2) / ESGP_FundingRate) * ESGP_TaperCond3
    
    End If 
 
 Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If

    Return result

End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P33_Total1617HNPlaces

Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product

    Dim NOR_Pre16HN As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P36_1617_pre16_HN
    Dim NOR_Pre16AP As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P37_1617_pre16_AP
    Dim NOR_HospPlaces As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P38_1617_HN_Hosp_Pl

    If DateOpened > "31 March 2017" And DateOpened < "01 September 2017" THEN

        result = HN_Places + Post16_HN_Places + AP_Places + Hospital_Places

    ELSE            

        result = NOR_Pre16HN + NOR_Pre16AP + NOR_HospPlaces + NOR_Post16HN
    
    End If

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If

    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P39a_1617SpHopsHNBAlloc
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim MonthsOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.P028_MonthsOpen
    Dim Hosp_Funding As Decimal = Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_HN:High_Needs_AY201617_Report.P10_Hosp_Funding_FY
    Dim HN_Pre16FYFunding As Decimal = Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_HN:High_Needs_AY201617_Report.P15_HN_Pre16_FYFunding
    Dim HN_Post16FYFunding As Decimal = Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_HN:High_Needs_AY201617_Report.P23_HN_Post16_IYFunding
    Dim HN_Funding As Decimal = 999
    Dim Post16HN_TotalAllocationFY As Decimal = 999
    Dim PostAprilHosp As Decimal = 999 
    Dim DateOpened As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim ConvertDate As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Convert_Date
    Dim DateUsed As Date = "1 September 2017"
    Dim MonthsOpen1617 As Decimal = 0
    Dim HNPost16 As Decimal = 0
    
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F603_ESGProtection_PlaceLed

If ConvertDate >= DateOpened Then 
    DateUsed = ConvertDate
Else 
    DateUsed = DateOpened
End If 

MonthsOpen1617 = DateDiff("m", DateUsed, "1 September 2017")

If MonthsOpen1617 < 12 Then 
    HNPost16 = HN_Post16FYFunding / MonthsOpen1617 * 12
Else 
    HNPost16 = HN_Post16FYFunding
End If 

Dim HNFunding16 As Decimal = HN_Pre16FYFunding + HNPost16


If acadfilter = 1 Then
    
    If DateOpened > "31 March 2017" And DateOpened < "01 September 2017" THEN

        result = HN_Funding + Post16HN_TotalAllocationFY + PostAprilHosp

    Else
     
        result = HNFunding16 + Hosp_Funding
    
    End If 

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If 

    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P42_1617ESGProt
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim ESGP_PlaceRatio As Decimal =            Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P06_Place_Ratio
    Dim ESG_MainstreamProtection As Decimal =   Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_ESGProtection:Data_Output_Mainstream.P32_ESG_MainstreamProtection
    Dim SpHospESGProtection As Decimal =        Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_ESGProtection:Data_Output.P72_SpHospESGProtection
    Dim APESGProtection As Decimal =            Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_ESGProtection:Data_Output.P73_APESGProtection
    Dim OutcomeAdjTotal As Decimal =            DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2016/17.EFA_Adjustments.EFA_Adjustments.ESG_protection_outcome_adjustment_total
    Dim AP_Post16_Provider As Decimal =         Products.1718_Global_Variables.F601_ESGProtection_Post16onlyAP
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =                 Products.1718_Global_Variables.F603_ESGProtection_PlaceLed
    'Dim Subtype As String =                    Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype
    Dim Sum As Decimal =                        ESG_MainstreamProtection + SpHospESGProtection + APESGProtection + OutcomeAdjTotal
    
Print(ESGP_PlaceRatio, "P06", rid)
Print(ESG_MainstreamProtection, "PersistedP32", rid)
Print(SpHospESGProtection, "PersistedP72", rid)
Print(APESGProtection, "PersistedP73", rid)
Print(OutcomeAdjTotal, "DatasetsOutcomeAdjTotal", rid)
Print(AP_Post16_Provider, "F601", rid)
Print(acadfilter, "F603", rid)
'Print(Subtype, "Subtype", rid)
Print(Sum, "Sum", rid)
    

    If AP_Post16_Provider = 1 Then
    
        result = Sum * ESGP_PlaceRatio
    
    Else
        
        If acadfilter = 1 Then 
        
            result = Sum
    
        Else 
        
            exclude(rid)
            
        End If 
        
    End If 


    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P45_1617Post16ExlBursary
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim Allocation1619 As Decimal = Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_Post16:Post16_AY201617_Report.P08_1619Allocation
    Dim MonthsOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.P028_MonthsOpen
    Dim AP_Post16_Provider As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F601_ESGProtection_Post16onlyAP
    Dim Allocation16to19 As Decimal =  999
    Dim OpenDate As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim ConvertDate As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Convert_Date
    Dim DateUsed As Date = "1 September 2017"
    Dim MonthsOpen1617 As Decimal = 0
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F603_ESGProtection_PlaceLed

 If ConvertDate >= OpenDate Then
        DateUsed = ConvertDate
        Else
        DateUsed = OpenDate
        End If
        
MonthsOpen1617 = DateDiff("m", DateUsed, "1 September 2017")

If AP_Post16_Provider = 1 Then

    result = 0

    If acadfilter = 1 Then    
       
        ElseIf OpenDate > "31 March 2017" And OpenDate < "01 September 2017" THEN
    
            result = Allocation16to19 / MonthsOpen1617 * 12        
    
        ElseIf MonthsOpen1617 < 12 THEN
        
                result =  Allocation1619 / MonthsOpen1617 * 12
            
        Else
                result = Allocation1619
            
        End If   
    
    Else 
    
        exclude(rid)
        
    End If 


    Return result

End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P47_1617APTotalAdjustUnitVal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim ESGP_APHNB As Decimal =         Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P39b_1617APHNBAlloc
    Dim ESGP_APESGRecalc As Decimal =   Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P41_1617APESGRecalc
    Dim ESGP_ExclBursary As Decimal =   Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P45_1617Post16ExlBursary
    Dim ESGP_APPlaces As Decimal =      Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P35_1617APPlaces
    Dim ESGP_AllocProt As Decimal =     Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P42_1617ESGProt
    Dim ESGP_TotalHNPlaces As Decimal = Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P33_Total1617HNPlaces
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F603_ESGProtection_PlaceLed
    
If acadfilter = 1 Then

    IF ESGP_APPlaces = 0 OR ESGP_TotalHNPlaces = 0 THEN

        result = 0

    ELSE

        result = ((ESGP_APHNB + ESGP_APESGRecalc) / ESGP_APPlaces) + ((ESGP_AllocProt + ESGP_ExclBursary) / ESGP_TotalHNPlaces)
    
    End If 

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If 

    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P50_SpHosp1617ESGProt
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim ESGP_SpecHospHNPlaces As Decimal =  Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P34_1617SpecHospHNPlaces
    Dim ESGP_ESGProt As Decimal =           Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P42_1617ESGProt
    Dim ESGP_HNPlaces As Decimal =          Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P33_Total1617HNPlaces
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =             Products.1718_Global_Variables.F603_ESGProtection_PlaceLed
    
If acadfilter = 1 Then

    If ESGP_HNPlaces = 0 OR ESGP_SpecHospHNPlaces = 0 THEN

        result = 0

    ELSE

        result = (ESGP_ESGProt / ESGP_HNPlaces) * ESGP_SpecHospHNPlaces
        
    End if

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If 

    Return result
    
End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P62_SpHospFundingRate1
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim ESGP_TaperCond1 As Decimal =            Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P20_TaperCond1
    Dim ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate As Decimal = Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P56_SpHosp1617FundingRate
    Dim ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh1 As Decimal =    Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P58_SpHospTaperThresh1
    Dim Minimum As Decimal =                    0
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =                 Products.1718_Global_Variables.F603_ESGProtection_PlaceLed
    
If acadfilter = 1 Then

    If ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate = 0 THEN

        result = 0

    Else
        
        If ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh1 > ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate Then 

            Minimum = ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate
        
        Else 
        
            Minimum = ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh1
            
        End If 
                   
        result = -1 * (Minimum / ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate) * ESGP_TaperCond1
    
    End If 
    
Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If  
     
    Return result

End Function

Name: ESGProtection_P64_SpHospFundingRate2
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim ESGP_TaperCond2 As Decimal =Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGPRotection_P22_TaperCond2
    Dim ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate As Decimal =Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P56_SpHosp1617FundingRate
    Dim ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh1 As Decimal =Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P58_SpHospTaperThresh1
    Dim ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh2 As Decimal =Products.1718_ESG_Protection.ESGProtection_P60_SpHospTaperThresh2
    Dim Minimum As Decimal = 0
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F603_ESGProtection_PlaceLed
    
If acadfilter = 1 Then    
    
    If ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate = 0 THEN

        result = 0

    ELSE

        If ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh2 - ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh1 > ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate - ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh1 Then 
        
            Minimum = ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate - ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh1
            
        Else 
        
            Minimum = ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh2 - ESGP_SpHospTaperThresh1

        End If 
        
        result = -1 * (Minimum / ESGP_SpHosp1617FundingRate) * ESGP_TaperCond2
    
    End If

Else 

    exclude(rid)
    
End If 

    Return result
    
End Function

Name: HN_P23_HN_Post16_IYFunding_V1
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim ConvertDate As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Convert_Date
    Dim OpenedDate As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim DateUsed As Date
    Dim MonthsOpen As Decimal = DateDiff("m",DateUsed, "01 September 2018")
    Dim Post16Filter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.Post16Filter
    Dim HN22_Post16FY As Decimal = Products.1718_HighNeeds.HN_P22_HN_Post16_FYFunding

    If ConvertDate >= OpenedDate then
        DateUsed = ConvertDate
        Else
        DateUsed = OpenedDate
    End If 
       
    If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) then
        
        If ConvertDate > OpenedDate Or (OpenedDate = ConvertDate And (Post16Filter = 1 Or Post16Filter = 2)) then
        
            Result = HN22_Post16FY / 12 * MonthsOpen
            
            Else
            
            Result = HN22_Post16FY
            
        End If
            
        Else exclude(rid)
     
    End If     
    
        Result = HN22_Post16FY
        
    Return result
End Function

Name: SUG_P00_SUG_Years_Open
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim DateOpened As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies     
        
If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) Then
 
 If DateOpened >= "01/09/2017" And DateOpened <= "31/08/2018" Then
                Result = 1
            ElseIf DateOpened >= "01/09/2016" And DateOpened <= "31/08/2017" Then
                Result = 2 
            ElseIf DateOpened >= "01/09/2015" And DateOpened <= "31/08/2016" Then
                Result = 3
            Else exclude(rid)    
            End If
    
    End If         

     Return result   
    
End Function

Name: P01a_Phase
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
     Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 'calls the 'all academies' filter
     Dim Phase As String = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.Academy_Phase 'calls phase from MasterSUGPOG dataset To be used In calculations
     
     Print(AcadFilter, "AcadFilter", rid)
     Print(Phase, "Phase", rid)
     
     If AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183 then
     If Phase Like "Primary" then
                
                result = 1
                
                    ElseIf Phase Like "Junior" then
                    
                    result = 1

                        ElseIf Phase Like "Infant" then   
                       
                        result = 1
                    
                            ElseIf Phase Like "Secondary" then
                        
                            result = 2
                                                                
                                  ElseIf Phase Like "All through" Or Phase Like "All Through" then
                                    
                                    result = 3
                                        
                                    Else
                                    
                                    result = 0

        End If
        End If
          
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: SUG_P11_PlaceLed_FundingRate
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim Phase As String = Products.1718_SUG.P01a_Phase
    Dim YearsOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P00_SUG_Years_Open 
    Dim PupilCount As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P01_pupilcount
    Dim PriSUGAMin As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P05_Pri_SUGA_Min
    Dim SecRate As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGA_P08a_Per_Place_Funding_Rate    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim SUGA_Override As Decimal = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_SUG_SUGA_Override
    Dim IsNull As Boolean 
        IsNull = iif(Datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_SUG_SUGA_Override,false,true)
    
        
If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) Then

    If FundingBasis = "Census" Or FundingBasis = "Estimate" Then
    
    exclude(rid) 
    
    Else
    
       End if
       End if
    
     If FundingBasis = "Place" Then 
            If IsNull = false Then
                Result = SUGA_Override

    
        If YearsOpen = 1 Then 
            If PupilCount <= 100 Then
                Result = PriSUGAMin
            ElseIf PupilCount > 100 Then 
                Result = PriSUGAMin + ((PupilCount - 100) * SecRate)
            Else Result = 0
            End If 
        End If            
                               
    End If 

Else exclude(rid)

End If 

    Return result   
    
End Function

Name: SUGB_P19_SpareCapacityPri
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim Phase As String = Products.1718_SUG.P01a_Phase
    Dim CapacityPerCent As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P18_CapacityPerCent
    Dim FundingPerCentMin As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P16_FundingPerCentMin
    Dim CapacityPerCentMin As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P15_CapacityPerCentMin    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies   



 If FundingBasis = "Place" Or Phase = 2 Or Phase = 3 then
    exclude(rid)
    End if
    
    If acadFilter = (17181 Or acadFilter = 17182 Or acadFilter = 17183) And Phase = 1 And CapacityPerCent >= FundingPerCentMin Then 
    result = 0
    else
    result = Math.Round((CapacityPerCentMin - CapacityPerCent) * 100)
    
    End if
   
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: SUGB_P20_CapacityFundingRatePri
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim PerPercentRate As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P14_PerPercentRate
    Dim SpareCapacityPri As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P19_SpareCapacityPri
    Dim PriMinCap As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P12_Pri_MinCap
    Dim PriMaxCap As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P13_Pri_MaxCap    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies  
    Dim phase As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.P01a_Phase        
        
 If FundingBasis = "Place" Or Phase = 2 Or Phase = 3 then
    exclude(rid)
    End if
    
    If acadFilter = (17181 Or acadFilter = 17182 Or acadFilter = 17183) And Phase = 1 Then 
                                                          
   

        If SpareCapacityPri * PerPercentRate < PriMinCap  Then
            Result = 0
        ElseIf SpareCapacityPri * PerPercentRate > PriMaxCap Then
            Result = PriMaxCap
        Else
            Result = SpareCapacityPri * PerPercentRate        
        End If 
        
      

Else exclude(rid)

End If 

    Return result   
    
End Function

Name: SUGB_P28_CapacityFundingRateSmall
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
  
    'Dim PupilCount As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P01_pupilcount
    Dim PPRateSmall As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P25_PerPercentRateSmall
    Dim SpareCap As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P27_SpareCapacity
    Dim SecMinCap As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P22_SecMinCap
    Dim SecMaxCapSmall As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P23_SecMaxCapSmall
    Dim MaxCapSmall As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P32_MaxCapSmall     
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies     
    Dim MaxCap As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.MAXCAP
    Dim FundingBasis As string = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim Phase As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.P01a_Phase
    
If FundingBasis = "Place" Or Phase = 1 then
    exclude(rid)
    Else

If AcadFilter = (17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) Then

 
        If MaxCap > 0 And MaxCap <= MaxCapSmall Then
            If SpareCap * PPRateSmall < SecMinCap Then 
                Result = 0
            ElseIf SpareCap * PPRateSmall > SecMaxCapSmall Then 
                Result = SecMaxCapSmall
            Else 
                Result = SpareCap * PPRateSmall
            End If
        Else Result = 0       
        End If                       

End If 
End If
    Return result   
    
End Function

Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product

    Dim YearsOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P00_SUG_Years_Open

    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies  
    Dim SUGB_Override As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_SUGB_Formulaic_Override
    Dim Prov_SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype
    Dim Phase As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.P01a_Phase
    Dim MaxCap As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.MAXCAP
    Dim MaxCapSmall As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P32_MaxCapSmall
    Dim IsNull As Boolean
        IsNull = iif(datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_SUGB_Formulaic_Override,false,true)    
          
    If acadFilter = (17181 Or acadFilter = 17182 Or acadFilter = 17183) And (Phase = 2 Or Phase = 3) And Prov_SubType = "11ACA" And MaxCap > 0 And MaxCap <= MaxCapSmall then 
    If IsNull = False then      
    result = SUGB_Override
    Else
    If YearsOpen = 1 Or YearsOpen = 2 Or YearsOpen = 3 then
    result = CapFunRateSmall / 3
    else
    result = 0
    
    End if
    End If
    End If
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: SUGB_P30_CapacityFundingRateLarge
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    
    Dim PupilCount As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P01_pupilcount
    Dim SecMinCap As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P22_SecMinCap 
    Dim SecMaxCapLarge As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P24_SecMaxCapLarge 
    Dim PPRateLarge As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P26_PerPercentRateLarge 
    Dim SpareCap As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P27_SpareCapacity
    Dim MinCapLarge As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P33_MinCapLarge     
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies     
    Dim MaxCap As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.MAXCAP
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim Phase As decimal = Products.1718_SUG.P01a_Phase
    
    Print(PupilCount,"PupilCount",rid)
    Print(SecMinCap,"SecMinCap",rid)
    Print(SecMaxCapLarge,"SecMaxCapLarge",rid)
    Print(PPRateLarge,"PPRateLarge",rid)
    Print(SpareCap,"SpareCap",rid)
    Print(MinCapLarge,"MinCapLarge",rid)
    Print(AcadFilter,"AcadFilter",rid)
    Print(MaxCap,"MaxCap",rid)
    Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)
    Print(Phase,"Phase",rid)
    
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Or Phase = 1 then
        exclude(rid)
    Else
    
        If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) Then 

            If PupilCount > 0 And MaxCap >= MinCapLarge Then 
                If SpareCap * PPRateLarge < SecMinCap Then 
                    Result = 0
                ElseIf SpareCap * PPRateLarge > SecMaxCapLarge Then 
                    Result = SecMaxCapLarge
                Else 
                    Result = SpareCap * PPRateLarge
                End If
            Else 
                Result = 0
            End If

        End If
    End If        

    Return result   
    
End Function

Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    
    Dim PupilCount As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P01_pupilcount
    Dim MaxCapSmall As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P32_MaxCapSmall
    Dim MinCapLarge As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P33_MinCapLarge 
    Dim MaxCap As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P17_Capacity    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies     
        
If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) Then

       If MaxCap > MaxCapSmall And MaxCap < MinCapLarge Then 
            Result = MaxCap - MaxCapSmall
        Else 
            Result = 0
        End If 
                               
           
Else exclude(rid)

End If 

    Return result   
    
End Function

Name: SUGB_P42_SpareCapacityMedSec
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product

Name: SUGB_P43_CapacityFundingRateMedium
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim PupilCount As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P01_pupilcount
    Dim MinCapLarge As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P33_MinCapLarge
    Dim MaxCapSmall As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P32_MaxCapSmall
    Dim SpareCapMedSec As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P42_SpareCapacityMedSec
    Dim RatePPCent As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P41_RatePerPerCent
    Dim SecMinCap As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P22_SecMinCap 
    Dim CapsComb As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P40_CapsCombined 
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies  
    Dim MaxCap As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.MAXCAP
    Dim Phase As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.P01a_Phase

       
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Or Phase = 1 then
    exclude(rid)
    End if

    If acadFilter = (17181 Or acadFilter = 17182 Or acadFilter = 17183) And MaxCap > MaxCapSmall And MaxCap < MinCapLarge then
    If (SpareCapMedSec * RatePPCent) < SecMinCap then
    result = 0
    else
    
    If SpareCapMedSec > 20 And (SpareCapMedSec * RatePPCent) > CapsComb then
        
        Result = 20 * RatePPCent
        
        Else
        
            If (SpareCapMedSec * RatePPCent) > CapsComb then
            result = CapsComb
            else
            result = SpareCapMedSec * RatePPCent
    
    End if
    End if
    End if
    End if 
    
    
    Return result
    
    End Function

Name: SUGB_P44_Med_Secondary_Funding_ProRata
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim CapFunRateMed As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P43_CapacityFundingRateMedium
    Dim YearsOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P00_SUG_Years_Open    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim Phase As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.P01a_Phase 
    Dim MaxCap As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.MAXCAP  
    Dim SUGB_Override As Decimal = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_SUGB_Formulaic_Override
    Dim Prov_SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype
    Dim MaxCapSmall As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P32_MaxCapSmall
    Dim MinCapLarge As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUGB_P33_MinCapLarge
    Dim IsNull As Boolean 
        IsNull = iif(Datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_SUGB_Formulaic_Override,false,true)
        
If FundingBasis = "Place" Or Phase = 1 then
    exclude(rid)
    End if

    If (acadfilter = 17181 Or acadFilter = 17182 Or acadFilter = 17183) And (Phase = 2 Or Phase = 3) And Prov_SubType = "11ACA" And MaxCap > MaxCapSmall And MaxCap < MinCapLarge then 
    If IsNull = false then      
    result = SUGB_Override
    Else
    If YearsOpen = 1 Or YearsOpen = 2 Or YearsOpen = 3
    result = CapFunrateMed / 3
    else
    exclude(rid)
    
    End if
    End If
    End If
    
    
    Return result
End Function

    Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)

    Print(ClassSize, "ClassSize",rid)
    Print(Phase, "Phase",rid)
    Print(AcadFilter, "AcadFilter",rid)
    Print(FormEntry, "FormEntry", rid)
      

 If FundingBasis = "Place" Then 
    Exclude(rid)
    else
    If AcadFilter = (17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) And Phase = 1 then
    If FormEntry < 1.5 Then 
    result = 1 
    else
    If FormEntry >= 1.5 then
    Result = 2
    else
    exclude(rid)
    
    End If
    End If
    End If
    End If
    
    Return result

Name: SUGA_P07_Pri_Funding
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim YearsOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P00_SUG_Years_Open 
    Dim FormsOfEntry As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P04_FormsOfEntry
    Dim PriSUGAMin As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P05_Pri_SUGA_Min
    Dim PriSUGAMax As Decimal = Products.1718_SUG.SUG_P06_Pri_SUGA_Max
    Dim Phase As String = Products.1718_SUG.P01a_Phase    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim Prov_SubType As String = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype    
    Dim SUGA_Override As Decimal = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_SUG_SUGA_Override
    Dim SUGA_Override_String As String = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_SUG_SUGA_Override
    Dim IsNull As Boolean
        IsNull = iif(Datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_SUG_SUGA_Override,false,true)
If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) Then

 If FundingBasis = "Place" Then
    
    result = 0 
    
    Else
    
    End if
    
     If Prov_SubType = "11ACA" And Phase = 1 Then 
            If IsNull=False then
            Result = SUGA_Override
                
              
        ElseIf YearsOpen = 1 Then 
            If Phase = 1 And FormsOfEntry = 1 Then
                Result = PriSUGAMin 
            ElseIf Phase = 1 And FormsOfEntry = 2 Then 
                Result = PriSUGAMax 
            Else exclude(rid)
            End If             
        End If                       
End If 

Else exclude(rid)

End If 

    Return result   
    
End Function

    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product

If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) Then

 If FundingBasis = "Place" Then
    
    exclude(rid) 
    
    Else
    
    End if
    
     If Prov_SubType = "11ACA" And Phase = 2 Then 
            If IsNull = false Then
                Result = SUGA_Override

            If Phase = 2

            Else Result = 0

        End If                       
End If 

Else exclude(rid)

End If 

    Return result   
    
End Function

Name: P00_POG_Years_Open
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
 
    Dim DateOpen As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies     
        
If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183)          
        If DateOpen >= "01/09/2017" And DateOpen <= "31/08/2018" Then 
            Result = 1 
        ElseIf DateOpen >= "01/09/2016" And DateOpen <= "31/08/2017" Then 
            Result = 2
        ElseIf DateOpen >= "01/09/2015" And DateOpen <= "31/08/2016" Then 
            Result = 3
        ElseIf DateOpen >= "01/09/2014" And DateOpen <= "31/08/2015" Then 
            Result = 4
        ElseIf DateOpen >= "01/09/2013" And DateOpen <= "31/08/2014" Then 
            Result = 5
        ElseIf DateOpen >= "01/09/2012" And DateOpen <= "31/08/2013" Then 
            Result = 6
        ElseIf DateOpen < "01/09/2012" Then 
            Result = 0
           
           End If 

Else exclude(rid)
End If 
    Return result   
    
End Function

Name: P01_Pri_pupilcount
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product

    Dim YearsOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P00_POG_Years_Open
    Dim Yr1 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.Yr1_Intake_NOR_Primary
    Dim Yr2 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.Yr2_Intake_NOR_Primary 
    Dim Yr3 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.Yr3_Intake_NOR_Primary 
    Dim Yr4 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.Yr4_Intake_NOR_Primary 
    Dim Yr5 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.Yr5_Intake_NOR_Primary 
    Dim Yr6 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.Yr6_Intake_NOR_Primary     
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies     
        
If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) Then          
        If YearsOpen = 1 Then 
            Result = Yr1
        Else
        If YearsOpen = 2  Then 
            Result = Yr2 - Yr1
        Else
        If YearsOpen = 3  Then 
            Result = Yr3 - Yr2
        Else
        If YearsOpen = 4  Then 
            Result = Yr4 - Yr3
        Else
        If YearsOpen = 5  Then 
            Result = Yr5 - Yr4
        Else
        If YearsOpen = 6  Then 
            Result = Yr6 - Yr5
        Else 
            
Exclude(rid)
  
End If 
End If 
End If 
End If 
End If 
End If 
End If 
 

Return result   

  
End Function

Name: P01a_Phase
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
     Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 'calls the 'all academies' filter
     Dim Phase As String = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.Academy_Phase 'calls phase from MasterSUGPOG dataset To be used In calculations
     
     Print (AcadFilter, "AcadFilter", rid)
     Print (Phase, "Phase", rid)
     
     If AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183 then
     If Phase Like "Primary" then
                
                result = 1
                
                    ElseIf Phase Like "Junior" then
                    
                    result = 1
                    
                        ElseIf Phase Like "Secondary" then
                    
                        result = 2
                                                            
                              ElseIf Phase Like "All through" Or Phase Like "All Through" then
                                
                                result = 3
                                    
                                Else
                                
                                result = 0

        End If
        End If
         
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P09_PriPlace_Funding
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181) 
    Dim Override As String =  DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGPPR_Override
    Dim IsNull As Boolean
        IsNull = iif(DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGPPR_Override,false,true)
    Dim PriPupilCount As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P01_Pri_pupilcount 
    Dim PriPlaceRate As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P08_PriPlace_FundingRate   
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim Phase As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P01a_Phase  
    Dim SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype  
    
    
    If FundingBasis = "Estimate" Or FundingBasis = "Census" Then
    
        Result = 0 
        
        Else
        
    If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) And Phase = 1 Then 
    
    If IsNull=false Then

    Result = Override
         
    Else 
    
    If SubType = "12FSC" And Phase = 1 Then
    
        Result = PriPupilCount * PriPlaceRate

    Else 
    
    Exclude(rid)

End If 
End If 
End If 
End If 

    Return result   
    
End Function

Name: P11_SecPlace_Funding
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181) 
    Dim Override As String = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGPPR_Override
    Dim IsNull As boolean
        IsNull = iif(DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGPPR_Override,false,true)
    Dim SecPupilCount As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P02_Sec_pupilcount 
    Dim SecPlaceRate As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P10_SecPlace_FundingRate   
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies  
    Dim SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype 
    Dim Phase As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P01a_Phase   


    If FundingBasis = "Estimate" Or FundingBasis = "Census" Then
    
        Result = 0
    
    Else                                                         
        
        If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) And Phase = 2 Then 
        
            If IsNull = false Then  
            
                Result = Override
            
            Else 
            
                If (SubType = "12FSC" Or SubType = "22AAP" Or SubType = "19FSS") And Phase = 2 Then
                
                    Result = SecPupilCount * SecPlaceRate
                
                Else
                
                    exclude(rid)
                
                End If 
            End If 
        End If 
    End If 

    Return result   


End Function

Name: P11a_AllThrough_Place
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181) 
    Dim Override As String = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGPPR_Override
    Dim IsNull As boolean
        IsNull = iif(DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGPPR_Override,false,true)
    Dim PriPupilCount As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P01_Pri_pupilcount 
    Dim PriPlaceRate As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P08_PriPlace_FundingRate
    Dim SecPupilCount As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P02_Sec_pupilcount 
    Dim SecPlaceRate As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P10_SecPlace_FundingRate   
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies  
    Dim SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype 
    Dim Phase As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P01a_Phase   


    If FundingBasis = "Estimate" Or FundingBasis = "Census" Then
    
    Result = 0
    
    Else                                                         
                
    If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) And Phase = 3 Then 
     
     If isNull = false Then  
     
     Result = Override
 
    Else 
    
    If (SubType = "12FSC" Or SubType = "22AAP" Or SubType = "19FSS") And Phase = 3 Then
    
        Result = (PriPupilCount * PriPlaceRate) + (SecPupilCount * SecPlaceRate)

        Else
        exclude(rid)

End If 
End If 
End If 
End If 

    Return result   


End Function

Name: P42_EmptyCohorts
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim academyfilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim Phase As String = Products.1718_POG.P01a_Phase          
    Dim POG_Years_Open As Decimal = products.1718_POG.P00_POG_Years_Open
    Dim EmptyCohortsOnOpen As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.MasterSUGPOG.EmptyCohorts_On_Open
    
    Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)
    Print(Phase,"Phase",rid)
    Print(POG_Years_Open,"POG_Years_Open",rid)
    Print(EmptyCohortsOnOpen,"EmptyCohortsOnOpen",rid)
    
   If FundingBasis = "Place" then
   result = 0 
   Else
   
   If academyFilter = (17181 Or academyFilter = 17182 Or academyFilter = 17183) And Phase = 1 then
   If POG_Years_Open = 1 then
   result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen
   End if
   
   If POG_Years_Open = 2 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 1) < 0 then
    result = 0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 1
    End If 
    End If
    
   If POG_Years_Open = 3 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 2) < 0 then
    result = 0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 2
    End If
    End If
    
   If POG_Years_Open = 4 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 3) < 0 then
    result = 0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 3
    End If
    End If
    
   If POG_Years_Open = 5 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 4) < 0 then
    result = 0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 4
    End If
    End If
    
   If POG_Years_Open = 6 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 5) < 0 then
    result = 0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 5
    End if
   End If 
    
       End if
     
   
   '----------------
   
   If academyFilter = (17181 Or academyFilter = 17182 Or academyFilter = 17183) And Phase = 2 then
   If POG_Years_Open = 1 then
   result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen
     End if
   End If 
   
   If POG_Years_Open = 2 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 1) < 0 then
    result = 0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 1
    End if
   End If 
    
   If POG_Years_Open = 3 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 2) < 0 then
    result = 0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 2
    End if
   End If 
   
    If POG_Years_Open = 4 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 3) < 0 then
    result = 0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 3
    End if
    End if
       
    '----------------------------------
    
   If academyFilter = (17181 Or academyFilter = 17182 Or academyFilter = 17183) And Phase = 3 then
   If POG_Years_Open = 1 then
   If EmptyCohortsOnOpen > 6 then
   result = 6
   else
   result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen
   End if
   End If   
   
   If POG_Years_Open = 2 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 2) > 6 then
    result = 6
    else
    If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 2) < 0 then    
    result =  0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 2
   End if
   End If
End if   
    
   If POG_Years_Open = 3 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 4) > 6 then
    result = 6
    else
    If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 4) < 0 then    
    result =  0
    Else 
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 4
   End if
   End If 
   End if
    
   If POG_Years_Open = 4 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 6) > 4 then
    result = 4
    Else 
    If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 6) < 0 then    
    result =  0
    else
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 6
   End if
   End If
End if   
    
   If POG_Years_Open = 5 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 8) > 2 then
    result = 2
    Else 
    If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 8) < 0 then    
    result =  0
    else
    result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 8
   End if
   End If 
   End if
    
   If POG_Years_Open = 6 then
   If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 9) > 1 then
    result = 1
    Else
    If (EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 9) < 0 then    
    result =  0
    Else
    Result = EmptyCohortsOnOpen - 9
    
    End if
    End if
    End if
    End if
    End if
     
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P43_PrimaryFunding
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim Override As String = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGLD_override
    Dim UPIN As Decimal = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.UPIN
    Dim IsNull As boolean
        IsNull = iif(DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGLD_override,false,true)    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181) 
    Dim Phase As String = Products.1718_POG.P01a_Phase 
    Dim SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype
    Dim EmptyCohorts As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P42_EmptyCohorts
    Dim Pri1 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P12_PriEmptyCohort1
    Dim Pri2 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P13_PriEmptyCohort2
    Dim Pri3 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P14_PriEmptyCohort3
    Dim Pri4 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P15_PriEmptyCohort4
    Dim Pri5 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P16_PriEmptyCohort5
    Dim Pri6 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P17_PriEmptyCohort6    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies     
    
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Then 
        Result = 0
                
    Else
    
If AcadFilter = (17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) And Phase = 1 And (SubType = "12FSC" Or UPIN = "130501" Or UPIN = "118604") Then  

        If IsNull= false Then 
        Result = Override
                
    Else
            If EmptyCohorts = 1 Then 
              result = Pri1   
                
            Else
            If EmptyCohorts = 2 Then 
                result = Pri2
                
            Else
            If EmptyCohorts = 3 Then 
                result = Pri3
                
            Else
            If EmptyCohorts = 4 Then 
                result = Pri4   
            Else
            If EmptyCohorts = 5 Then 
                result = Pri5
                
            Else
            If EmptyCohorts = 6 Then 
                result = Pri6
         
            
            End If 
            End If 
            End If 
            End If 
            End If 
            End If 
            End If
            End If
            End If
                           
Return result   
    
End Function

Name: P44_SecondaryFunding
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim Override As String = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGLD_override 
    Dim UPIN As Decimal = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.UPIN
    Dim IsNull As boolean
        IsNull = iif(DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGLD_override,false,true)
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181) 
    Dim Phase As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P01a_Phase 
    Dim SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype 
    Dim EmptyCohorts As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P42_EmptyCohorts
    Dim Sec1 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P19_SecEmptyCohort1
    Dim Sec2 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P20_SecEmptyCohort2
    Dim Sec3 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P21_SecEmptyCohort3
    Dim Sec4 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P22_SecEmptyCohort4    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies   

    If FundingBasis = "Place" Then 
        Result = 0
        
        Else
        
    If AcadFilter = (17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) And Phase = 2 And (SubType = "12FSC" Or UPIN = "132819") Then

    If IsNull = false Then 
        Result = Override
        
        Else
        
            If EmptyCohorts = 1 Then 
                Result = Sec1
                
            Else
            If EmptyCohorts = 2 Then 
                Result = Sec2
                
            Else
            If EmptyCohorts = 3 Then 
                Result = Sec3
           
           Else
            If EmptyCohorts = 4 Then 
                Result = Sec4   
     Else exclude(rid)           
            
    End If 
    End If 
    End If
    End If
    End If
    End If
    End If
  
 
Return result   
    
End Function

Name: P45_AllThroughFunding
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim Override As String =   DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGLD_override 
    Dim IsNull As Boolean
        IsNull = iif(DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGLD_override,false,true)
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181) 
    Dim Phase As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P01a_Phase 
    Dim SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype 
    Dim EmptyCohorts As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P42_EmptyCohorts
    Dim AT1 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P24_AllThruEmptyCohort1
    Dim AT2 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P25_AllThruEmptyCohort2
    Dim AT3 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P26_AllThruEmptyCohort3
    Dim AT4 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P27_AllThruEmptyCohort4
    Dim AT5 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P28_AllThruEmptyCohort5
    Dim AT6 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P29_AllThruEmptyCohort6   
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies  
    
    print(AT1,"AT1",rid)
    print(AT2,"AT2",rid)
    print(AT3,"AT3",rid)
    print(AT4,"AT4",rid)
    print(AT5,"AT5",rid)
    print(AT6,"AT6",rid)
    print(FundingBasis,"Funding Basis",rid)
    print(phase,"Phase",rid)
    print(SubType,"SubType",rid)
    print(AcadFilter,"AcadFilter",rid)
    print(Override,"Override",rid)

If FundingBasis = "Place" Then                               
    Result = 0
Else
    If (AcadFilter = 17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) And Phase = 3 And SubType = "12FSC" Then
        If IsNull = false  Then 
            Result = Override
        Else
            
            If EmptyCohorts = 1 Then 
                Result = AT1
            Else
                If EmptyCohorts = 2 Then 
                    Result = AT2
                Else
                    If EmptyCohorts = 3 Then 
                        Result = AT3
                    Else
                        If EmptyCohorts = 4 Then 
                            Result = AT4 
                        Else
                            If EmptyCohorts = 5 Then 
                                Result = AT5
                            Else
                                If EmptyCohorts = 6 Then 
                                    Result = AT6    
                                End If 
                            End If 
                        End If 
                    End If 
                End If 
            End If 
  
        End If 
    End If 
End If 
         
                  

Return result   
    
End Function

    Dim SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype

    Dim SS3 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P41_SpecialSchool_Year3

    If FundingBasis = "Census" Or FundingBasis = "Estimate" Then 
        Result = 0

    If AcadFilter = (17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) And SubType = "12FSC" Then

    If IsNull = false Then 
     Result = Override

    Else
    If YearsOpen = 1 Then                                  
        Result = SS1
        
    Else
    If YearsOpen = 2 Then 
        Result = SS2
        
    Else
    If YearsOpen = 3 Then 
        Result = SS3  
        
   
    
    End If 
    End If
    End If
    End If
    End If
    End If
    
    

Return result   
    
End Function

Name: P47_1619FreeSchoolFunding
Script:

    Dim IsNull As boolean
        IsNull = iif( DataSets.Academy_Allocations.SUG_/_POG.SUGPOG_Data.1718_Adjustments.1718_POGLD_override,false,true)   
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim SubType As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype    
    Dim YearsOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P00_POG_Years_Open 
    Dim SBSNOR As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P26_Total_NOR_SBS
    Dim FS1 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P31_1619FS_Year1
    Dim FS2 As Decimal = Products.1718_POG.P32_1619FS_Year2
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies     
        
    If AcadFilter = (17181 Or AcadFilter = 17182 Or AcadFilter = 17183) And SubType = "19FSS" And SBSNOR = 0 Then

    If IsNull = false Then  
        Result = Override
    
     Else
          If YearsOpen = 1 Then 
            Result = FS1  
            
        Else
        If YearsOpen = 2 Then 
            Result = FS2
            
        
        
        End If 
        End If 
        End If 
        End If

Name: NOR_P01_RU
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
     
    Dim RU_Flag as Single = LAtoProv(Products.1718_NOR.Reception_Uplift_Flag)
    Dim IsNull As Boolean
    IsNull = IIf(DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Reception_Uplift, false, true)    
    Dim RU_InpAdj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Reception_Uplift
    Dim RU_APT As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Adjusted_Factors_dataset.APT_Adjusted_Factors_dataset.Reception_Difference
    Dim RU_Census As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.Census_Number_Counts.Reception_Difference] 
    Dim RU_RFDC As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.Estimate_Number_Counts.Est_Reception_Difference]
    Dim NOR_RFDC As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.Estimate_Number_Counts.Est_NOR]
    Dim Guaranteed As String = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Amended_pupil_numbers_guaranteed?    
    Dim NOR_InpAdj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis 
                                                                                                                                                                 
 
                                                      
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Then  
    If RU_Flag = 1 And F900_FundingBasis = 1 And IsNull = False Then 
        Result = RU_InpAdj
    
    ElseIf RU_Flag = 1 And F900_FundingBasis = 1 And IsNull = True Then
        Result = RU_Census
        
    ElseIf RU_Flag = 1 And F900_FundingBasis = 2 And Guaranteed = "YES" And NOR_InpAdj > NOR_RFDC Then
        Result = RU_InpAdj
        
    ElseIf RU_Flag = 1 And F900_FundingBasis = 2 Then 
        Result = RU_RFDC        

    End If  

Else If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) Then 
    If RU_Flag = 1 And F900_FundingBasis = 1 Then
        Result = RU_APT
        
    ElseIf RU_Flag = 1 And F900_FundingBasis = 2 And Guaranteed = "YES" And NOR_InpAdj > NOR_RFDC Then
        Result = RU_InpAdj
    
    ElseIf RU_Flag = 1 And F900_FundingBasis = 2 Then 
        Result = RU_RFDC    
        
    End If            

Else Exclude(rid)  
End If     

    Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies", rid)
    Print(RU_Flag, "RU_Flag", rid)
    Print(F900_FundingBasis, "F900_FundingBasis", rid)    
    Print(RU_InpAdj, "Inp And Adj RU",rid)  

return result       
         
End Function

Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
     
    Dim IsNull As Boolean = iif(datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR_Primary,false,true)
    Dim RU_RFDC As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.Estimate_Number_Counts.Est_Reception_Difference]
    Dim NOR_P001 As Double = Products.1718_NOR.P001_NOR_Est_Pri
    Dim NOR_P008 As Double = Products.1718_NOR.P008_NOR_Est_RtoY11
    Dim Guaranteed As String = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Amended_pupil_numbers_guaranteed?    
    Dim NOR_InpAdj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR
    Dim NOR_Pri_InpAdj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR_Primary
    Dim NOR_Pri_Census As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.Census_Number_Counts.NOR_Primary
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis 
    Dim NOR_Pri_APT_Adj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Adjusted_Factors_dataset.APT_Adjusted_Factors_dataset.NOR_Primary                                                                                                                                                                 
    Dim NOR_P01_RU As Double = Products.1617_NOR.NOR_P01_RU
                                                      
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Then  
    If F900_FundingBasis = 1 And IsNull = False Then 
        Result = NOR_Pri_InpAdj
    
    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 1 And IsNull = True Then
        Result = NOR_Pri_Census
        
    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 2 And Guaranteed = "YES" And NOR_InpAdj > NOR_P008 Then
        Result = NOR_Pri_InpAdj
        
    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 2 Then 
        Result = NOR_P001        

    End If  

Else If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) Then 
    If F900_FundingBasis = 1 Then
        Result = NOR_Pri_APT_Adj - NOR_P01_RU
        
    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 2 And Guaranteed = "YES" And NOR_InpAdj > NOR_P008 Then
        Result = NOR_Pri_InpAdj
    
    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 2 Then 
        Result = NOR_P001    
        
    End If            

Else Exclude(rid)  
End If     
    
return result       
         
End Function
