    Dim result = 0
         
    Dim DateOpened As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim IsNull As Boolean
    IsNull = IIf(Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR_KS4, false, true)    
    Dim NOR_KS4_InpAdj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR_KS4 
    Dim NOR_InpAdj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR 
    Dim NOR_KS4_Cen As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.Census_Number_Counts.NOR_KS4
    Dim NOR_P007 As Double = Products.1718_NOR.P007_NOR_Est_KS4
    Dim NOR_P008 As Double = Products.1718_NOR.P008_NOR_Est_RtoY11
    Dim NOR_KS4_AdjFact As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Adjusted_Factors_dataset.APT_Adjusted_Factors_dataset.NOR_KS4
    Dim Guaranteed As String = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Amended_pupil_numbers_guaranteed?
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
                                                                  
    Print(IsNull, "IsNull", rid)
    Print(NOR_InpAdj, "NOR InpAdj", rid)
    Print(DateOpened, "Date Opened", rid)
    Print(F900_FundingBasis, "F900_FundingBasis", rid)
    Print(NOR_KS4_Cen, "NOR_KS4_Cen", rid)        
    Print(NOR_P008, "NOR_KS4_Est", rid)   
    Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies", rid)   
        
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And F100_AllAcademies = 17181 then
    If F900_FundingBasis = 1 And ISNULL = False Then
        Result = NOR_KS4_InpAdj

    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 1 And ISNULL = True Then
        Result = NOR_KS4_Cen 

    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 2 And Guaranteed = "YES" And NOR_InpAdj > NOR_P008 Then
        Result = NOR_KS4_InpAdj
        
    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 2 Then    
        Result = NOR_P007
    End If          

ElseIf currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) Then
    If F900_FundingBasis = 1 Then
        Result = NOR_KS4_AdjFact 

    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 2 And Guaranteed = "YES" And NOR_InpAdj > NOR_P008 Then
        Result = NOR_KS4_InpAdj
        
    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 2 Then 
        Result = NOR_P007
    
    End If           
 
Else Exclude(rid)   
End If    
                    
Return Result
End Function

Name: NOR_P12_HND_HNP_HN_PRI
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
    Dim HNs_Places_Total As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.High_Needs_Places.Total_pre-16_HNs_places]
    Dim NOR_P02_PRI As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P02_PRI 
    Dim NOR_P07_KS3 As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P07_KS3
    Dim NOR_P08_KS4 As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P08_KS4
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
                                                                       
    Dim Pri_Unadj_Split As Decimal = math.round(HNs_Places_Total * NOR_P02_PRI / (NOR_P02_PRI + NOR_P07_KS3 + NOR_P08_KS4), 0)
    Dim KS3_Unadj_Split As Decimal = math.round(HNs_Places_Total * NOR_P07_KS3 / (NOR_P02_PRI + NOR_P07_KS3 + NOR_P08_KS4), 0)
    Dim KS4_Unadj_Split As Decimal = math.round(HNs_Places_Total * NOR_P08_KS4 / (NOR_P02_PRI + NOR_P07_KS3 + NOR_P08_KS4), 0)
    Dim Total_Unadj_Split As Decimal = Pri_Unadj_Split + KS3_Unadj_Split + KS4_Unadj_Split
    Dim Diff As Decimal = Total_Unadj_Split - HNs_Places_Total 
  
    
    If KS3_Unadj_Split = 0 And KS4_Unadj_Split = 0 And (Diff < 0 Or Diff > 0 ) Then
        Result = Pri_Unadj_Split - Diff
    Else Result = Pri_Unadj_Split
    End If     

              
Return result
End Function

Name: NOR_P42a_Year_Groups_Primary
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
    Dim IsNull As Boolean = iif(datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Number_of_Primary_year_groups_for_all_schools,false,true)
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim Primary_YP_InAdj As Double = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Number_of_Primary_year_groups_for_all_schools
    Dim Primary_YG_Census As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Number_of_Primary_year_groups_for_all_schools]
    Dim Primary_Middle_YG_Census As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Number_of_Primary_year_groups_for_middle_schools]
    Dim Primary_YG_Estimate As Double = Products.1718_NOR.P010_NOR_TotalPri_YG
    Dim Primary_Year_Groups As Double
    
    Print(F900_FundingBasis, "F900_FundingBasis", rid)
    Print(Primary_YG_Census, "Primary_YG_Census", rid)
    Print(Primary_Middle_YG_Census, "Primary_Middle_YG_Census", rid)
    Print(Primary_YG_Estimate, "Primary_YG_Estimate", rid)
                                                          
    
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) Then
    If F900_FundingBasis = 1 And IsNull = False Then
    
        Primary_Year_Groups = Primary_YP_InAdj
    
    Else If F900_FundingBasis = 1 And IsNull = true Then
    
        Primary_Year_Groups =  Primary_YG_Census
    
    Else If F900_FundingBasis = 2
    
        Primary_Year_Groups = Primary_YG_Estimate
    
    Else 
    
        Primary_Year_Groups = 0
    
    End If  
Else 
    Exclude(rid)   
End If
       
       result = Primary_Year_Groups
       
    Return result
End Function

Name: NOR_P42b_Year_Groups_Secondary
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
    Dim IsNull = iif(datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Number_of_Secondary_year_groups_for_all_schools,false,true)
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim F900_FundingBasis = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim Sec_YG_InAdj = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Number_of_Secondary_year_groups_for_all_schools    
    Dim Sec_YG_Census = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Number_of_Secondary_year_groups_for_all_schools]
    Dim Sec_Middle_YG_Census = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Number_of_Secondary_year_groups_for_middle_schools]
    Dim Sec_YG_Estimate = Products.1718_NOR.P011_NOR_TotalSec_YG
    Dim Secondary_Year_Groups As Double
    
    Print(F900_FundingBasis, "F900_FundingBasis", rid)
    Print(Sec_YG_Census, "Sec_YG_Census", rid)
    Print(Sec_Middle_YG_Census, "Sec_Middle_YG_Census", rid)
    Print(Sec_YG_Estimate, "Sec_YG_Estimate", rid)
     
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) Then
    If F900_FundingBasis = 1 And IsNull = False Then
        Secondary_Year_Groups = Sec_YG_InAdj
    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 1 And IsNull = true Then
        Secondary_Year_Groups = Sec_YG_Census
    ElseIf F900_FundingBasis = 2 Then
        Secondary_Year_Groups =  Sec_YG_Estimate
    Else Secondary_Year_Groups = 0

End If  
    Else Exclude(rid)   
End If

result = Secondary_Year_Groups

Return result
End Function

Name: NOR_P08a_Y7
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim IandANOR_Y7 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR_Y7
    Dim CNCNOR_Y7 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.Census_Number_Counts.NOR_Y7
    Dim ENCNOR_Y7 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.Estimate_Number_Counts.Est_NOR_Y7
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim IandAPupilNumbers As String = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Amended_pupil_numbers_guaranteed?
    Dim IandANOR As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim IsNull As Boolean = iif(datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR_KS3,false,true)
    
IF currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 AND (AcadFilter = 17181 OR AcadFilter = 17182 OR AcadFilter = 17183) THEN

    IF FundingBasis = 1 AND ISNULL = False THEN
        
        Result = IandANOR_Y7

End Function

    Dim Y6 As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.Estimate_Number_Counts.Est_NOR_Y6
    Dim Reception_YG As Double

    Dim Y2_YG As Double
    Dim Y3_YG As Double
    Dim Y4_YG As Double
    Dim Y5_YG As Double
    Dim Y6_YG As Double
    
    If (Reception > 0) then
        Reception_YG = 1
    Else
        Reception_YG = 0
    End if
    
    If (Y1 > 0) then
        Y1_YG = 1
    Else
        Y1_YG = 0
    End if

        Y2_YG = 1
    Else
        Y2_YG = 0
    End if
    
    If (Y3 > 0) Then
        Y3_YG = 1
    Else
        Y3_YG = 0
    End if
    
    If (Y4 > 0) Then

    Else
        Y4_YG = 0
    End if
    
    If (Y5 > 0) Then
        Y5_YG = 1
    Else
        Y5_YG = 0
    End if
    
    If (Y6 > 0) Then
        Y6_YG = 1
    Else
        Y6_YG = 0
    End if
    
    Result = (Reception_YG + Y1_YG + Y2_YG + Y3_YG + Y4_YG + Y5_YG + Y6_YG)
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: NOR_P23b_Actual_HN_KS3_Deducted
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
              
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim TotalPlacesAPT As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Local_factors_dataset.APT_Local_factors_dataset.Total_number_of_High_Needs_places_in_2016/17]
    Dim APT As Boolean
    APT = IIf(Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Local_factors_dataset.APT_Local_factors_dataset.Total_number_of_High_Needs_places_in_2016/17, false, true)    
    Dim NOR_Inp_Adj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR_KS3
    Dim Pre16HNData As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.High_Needs_Places.Total_pre-16_HNs_places]
    Dim Pre16APData As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.High_Needs_Places.Total_pre-16_AP_places]
    Dim TotalPlacesHNData As Double = Pre16HNData + Pre16APData
    Dim NOR_P10_APT_HN_KS3 As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P10_APT_HN_KS3    
    Dim NOR_P16_HND_HNP_AP_KS3 As Double= Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P16_HND_HNP_AP_KS3 
    Dim NOR_P13_HND_HNP_HN_KS3 As Double =  Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P13_HND_HNP_HN_KS3  
    Dim HND_HN_KS3 As Double = NOR_P16_HND_HNP_AP_KS3 + NOR_P13_HND_HNP_HN_KS3     
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim HN_to_Deduct As Double
    
     
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then
    If (APT = True Or TotalPlacesAPT = 0) And TotalPlacesHNData > 0 Then
        HN_to_deduct = 0
    Else If TotalPlacesAPT > TotalPlacesHNData Then
        HN_to_deduct = HND_HN_KS3 
    Else 
        HN_to_deduct = NOR_P10_APT_HN_KS3
    End If     
   
Else Exclude(rid)

End If    
    
    
    Print(F900_FundingBasis, "Funding_Basis", rid)
    Print(NOR_P10_APT_HN_KS3, "NOR_P10_APT_HN_KS3", rid)
    Print(NOR_P16_HND_HNP_AP_KS3, "NOR_P16_HND_HNP_AP_KS3", rid)
    Print(NOR_P13_HND_HNP_HN_KS3, "NOR_P13_HND_HNP_HN_KS3", rid)
    Print(HND_HN_KS3, "HND_HN_KS3", rid)
    Print(HN_to_deduct, "HN_to_deduct", rid)
    Print(APT, "APT", rid)
 
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) And F900_FundingBasis = 1 Then 
    Result = 0
Else 
    Result = HN_to_deduct 
End If
    
Return Result
End Function

Name: NOR_P26b_Total_Actual_HN_deducted
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_Deduct As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_deducted
    Dim P23b_Actual_HN_KS3_Deduct As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P23b_Actual_HN_KS3_deducted
    Dim P24b_Actual_HN_KS4_Deduct As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P24b_Actual_HN_KS4_deducted
    Dim APT_Pri As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Local_factors_dataset.APT_Local_factors_dataset.Number_of_primary_pupils_on_roll_at_the_school_in_High_Needs_places_in_2016/17
    Dim APT_KS3 As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Local_factors_dataset.APT_Local_factors_dataset.Number_of_KS3_pupils_on_roll_at_the_school_in_High_Needs_places_in_2016/17
    Dim APT_KS4 As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Local_factors_dataset.APT_Local_factors_dataset.Number_of_KS4_pupils_on_roll_at_the_school_in_High_Needs_places_in_2016/17
    
    Print(P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_Deduct, "P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_Deduct", rid)
    Print(P23b_Actual_HN_KS3_Deduct, "P23b_Actual_HN_KS3_Deduct", rid) 
    Print(P24b_Actual_HN_KS4_Deduct, "P24b_Actual_HN_KS4_Deduct", rid) 
    
    
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Then     

    Result = P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_Deduct +  P23b_Actual_HN_KS3_Deduct + P24b_Actual_HN_KS4_Deduct

ElseIf currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) Then 

    Result = APT_Pri + APT_KS3 + APT_KS4

Else Exclude(rid)
End If 

Return result
End Function

    Dim NOR_P02_Pri As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P02_PRI

    Dim NOR_P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_Deducted As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_Deducted
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
       
  
    Print(NOR_P01_RU, "NOR P01 RU", rid)  
    Print(NOR_P02_Pri, "NOR P02 Pri", rid)
    Print(NOR_P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_Deducted, "NOR P02 Pri", rid)
     
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) And F900_FundingBasis = 1 Then 
   Result = NOR_P02_Pri + NOR_P01_RU
Else 
   Result = NOR_P02_Pri + NOR_P01_RU - NOR_P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_Deducted 
End If    
    
         
    Return result
End Function

Name: NOR_P22b_Actual_HN_Pri_Deducted
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
       
      
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim TotalPlacesAPT As Double =[Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Local_factors_dataset.APT_Local_factors_dataset.Total_number_of_High_Needs_places_in_2016/17]
    Dim APT As Boolean
    APT = IIf([Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Local_factors_dataset.APT_Local_factors_dataset.Total_number_of_High_Needs_places_in_2016/17], false, true)    
    Dim NOR_Inp_Adj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.NOR_Primary 
    Dim Pre16HNData As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.High_Needs_Places.Total_pre-16_HNs_places]
    Dim Pre16APData As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Number_Counts.High_Needs_Places.Total_pre-16_AP_places]
    Dim TotalPlacesHNData As Double = Pre16HNData + Pre16APData
    Dim NOR_P02_Pri As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P02_PRI
    Dim NOR_P01_RU As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P01_RU
    Dim NOR_P09_APT_HN_Pri As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P09_APT_HN_PRI    
    Dim NOR_P15_HND_HNP_AP_Pri As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P15_HND_HNP_AP_PRI 
    Dim NOR_P12_HND_HNP_HN_Pri As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P12_HND_HNP_HN_PRI 
    Dim HND_HN_Pri As Double = NOR_P12_HND_HNP_HN_Pri + NOR_P15_HND_HNP_AP_Pri     
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim HN_to_Deduct As Double
        
 If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then
   If (APT = True Or TotalPlacesAPT = 0) And TotalPlacesHNData > 0 Then
     HN_to_deduct = 0
   Else If TotalPlacesAPT > TotalPlacesHNData Then
     HN_to_deduct = HND_HN_Pri    '(NOR_P12_HND_HNP_HN_Pri + NOR_P15_HND_HNP_AP_Pri)
   Else 
     HN_to_deduct = NOR_P09_APT_HN_Pri
   End If     
Else Exclude(rid)
End If    
    
  
    Print(TotalPlacesAPT, "Total Places APT",rid)
    Print(TotalPlacesHNData, "Total Places HN Data",rid)
    Print(NOR_P09_APT_HN_Pri, "NOR_P09_APT HN Pri", rid)
    Print(NOR_P15_HND_HNP_AP_Pri, "NOR_P15_HND_HNP_AP_Pri", rid)
    Print(NOR_P12_HND_HNP_HN_Pri, "NOR_P12_HND_HNP_HN_Pri", rid)
    Print(HND_HN_Pri, "HND_HN_Pri", rid)
    Print(HN_to_deduct, "HN_to_deduct", rid)
    Print(APT, "APT", rid)
    Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies", rid)    
    
  If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) And F900_FundingBasis = 1 Then 
       Result = 0
  Else 
       Result = HN_to_deduct 
 End If    

    
    Return result
End Function

Name: NOR_P32_Total_NOR_ESGProt
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim NOR_P01_RU As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P01_RU                    
    Dim P22_Total_NOR_Pri_SBS As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS   
    Dim P25_Total_NOR_Sec_SBS As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS    
    Dim NOR_P21_P16 As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P21_P16
    Dim P26b_Total_Actual_HN_Deducted As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P26b_Total_Actual_HN_deducted       
                  
    Print(NOR_P01_RU, "NOR_P01_RU", rid)
    Print(P22_Total_NOR_Pri_SBS, "P22_Total_NOR_Pri_SBS", rid)
    Print(P25_Total_NOR_Sec_SBS, "P25_Total_NOR_Sec_SBS", rid)
    Print(NOR_P21_P16, "NOR_P21_P16", rid)
    
    
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 Then 
   If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Then    
   Result = P22_Total_NOR_Pri_SBS + P25_Total_NOR_Sec_SBS + NOR_P21_P16
   
   ElseIf (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) Then
   Result = P22_Total_NOR_Pri_SBS + P25_Total_NOR_Sec_SBS + NOR_P21_P16 - P26b_Total_Actual_HN_Deducted
   
   End If 

Else Exclude(rid)  
   
End If
  
    Return result
End Function

Name: NOR_P32b_TOTAL_ESGProt_incHN
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim NOR_P01_RU As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P01_RU
    Dim NOR_P02_Pri As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P02_PRI
    Dim NOR_P06_Sec As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P06_SEC
    Dim NOR_P21_P16 As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P21_P16 
    Dim NOR_P18_HND_HN_Pre16 As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P18_HND_HN_Pre16
    Dim NOR_P20_HND_Hosp_Pl As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P20_HND_Hosp_Pl
    Dim NOR_P19_HND_AP_Pre16 As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P19_HND_AP_Pre16
    Dim Tot_Places As Double = NOR_P18_HND_HN_Pre16 + NOR_P20_HND_Hosp_Pl + NOR_P19_HND_AP_Pre16   
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    
    
    Print(Tot_Places, "Tot_Places", rid)
    Print(NOR_P18_HND_HN_Pre16, "NOR_P18_HND_HN_Pre16", rid)
    Print(NOR_P19_HND_AP_Pre16, "NOR_P19_HND_AP_Pre16", rid)
    Print(NOR_P20_HND_Hosp_Pl, "NOR_P20_HND_Hosp_Pl",rid)
    Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies", rid)
    Print(F900_FundingBasis, "F900_FundingBasis", rid)
    
    
If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And F100_AllAcademies = 17181 And (F900_FundingBasis = 1 Or F900_FundingBasis = 2) Then     
   result = NOR_P01_RU + NOR_P02_Pri + NOR_P06_Sec + NOR_P21_P16
   
ElseIf currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) And (F900_FundingBasis = 1 Or F900_FundingBasis = 2) Then
   result = NOR_P02_Pri + NOR_P06_Sec + NOR_P21_P16
   
ElseIf currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 And (F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) And F900_FundingBasis = 3 Then 
   result = NOR_P01_RU + NOR_P02_Pri + NOR_P06_Sec + NOR_P21_P16 + NOR_P18_HND_HN_Pre16 + NOR_P19_HND_AP_Pre16 + NOR_P20_HND_Hosp_Pl
   
 Else Exclude(rid)
End If 
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: F100_AllAcademies
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
        
    Dim Date_Opened as date = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim Budget_ID1718 as String = DataSets.Administration.Providers.Funding_Streams.Budget(2017181)
    Dim ProviderType as string = DataSets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Type
    Dim Funding_Basis1718 as String = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim SubType As String = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Subtype
    Dim PrevMain As Boolean = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Previously_Maintained
    Dim ConvertDate As Date = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Convert_Date  
    Dim Budget_ID1617 as String = DataSets.Administration.Providers.Funding_Streams.Budget(2016171)
    Dim Funding_Basis1617 as String = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2016171)

    print(Date_Opened,"DateOpen",rid)
    Print(Budget_ID1718,"Budget_ID1718",rid)
    Print(ProviderType,"ProvType",rid)
    Print(Funding_Basis1718, "Funding_Basis1718",rid)
    Print(SubType, "SubType", rid)
    Print(PrevMain, "PrevMain", rid)
    Print(ConvertDate, "ConvertDate", rid)
    Print(Budget_ID1617,"Budget_ID1617",rid)
    Print(Funding_Basis1617, "Funding_Basis1617",rid)
    
    
    If subtype = "14CTC" Then 
    Exclude(RID) 
    ELSE If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 Then 
    If String.IsNullOrEmpty(budget_ID1718) Or String.IsNullOrEmpty(Funding_Basis1718) Then 
    Exclude(RID)   
    Else If (Budget_ID1718.Contains ("YPLRE") Or Budget_ID1718.Contains ("ZCONV")) Or ((Budget_ID1718.Contains ("YPLRC") Or Budget_ID1718.Contains ("YPLRA") Or Budget_ID1718.Contains("YPLRD")) And PrevMain = True) Then 
    If Date_Opened > "01 January 0001" And Date_Opened < "01 April 2017" Then 
    result = 17181 
    Else If Date_Opened  >= "01 April 2017"  And Date_Opened < "01 September 2017" Then 
    result = 17182 
    Else result = 17183 
    End If 
    End If 
    End If 
  
    
 If currentscenario.periodid = 2016171 Then 
 If String.IsNullOrEmpty(budget_ID1617) Or String.IsNullOrEmpty(Funding_Basis1617) Then 
 Exclude(RID) 
 Else If (Budget_ID1617.Contains ("YPLRE") And Date_Opened >= "01 April 2017" And Date_Opened < "01 September 2017") Or (Budget_ID1617.Contains ("ZCONV") And convertdate >= "01 April 2017" And convertdate < "01 September 2017") Or ((Budget_ID1617.Contains ("YPLRC") Or Budget_ID1617.Contains ("YPLRA") Or Budget_ID1617.Contains("YPLRD") And (Date_Opened >= "01 April 2017" And Date_Opened < "01 September 2017") Or (convertdate >= "01 April 2017" And convertdate < "01 September 2017")) And PrevMain = True) Then 
 result = 16171 
 Else Exclude(RID) 
 End If 
 End If 

 
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: F900_FundingBasis
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
      
    Dim Date_Opened as date = datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened
    Dim Budget_ID as String = DataSets.Administration.Providers.Funding_Streams.Budget(2017181)
    Dim ProviderType as string = DataSets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Provider_Type
    Dim Funding_Basis as String = Datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
             
    Print(Funding_Basis, "ABCD Type",rid)
    
    If Budget_ID isnot nothing then
   
    
        If currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 and Funding_Basis = "Census" and (Budget_ID.Contains("YPLRE") Or Budget_ID.Contains("ZCONV")) Then
            Result = 1 
        ElseIf currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 and Funding_Basis = "Estimate" and (Budget_ID.Contains("YPLRE") Or Budget_ID.Contains("ZCONV")) Then
            Result = 2  
        ElseIf currentscenario.periodid = 2017181 and (Funding_Basis = "Place") and (Budget_ID.Contains("YPLRE") Or Budget_ID.Contains("ZCONV")) Then
           Result = 3 
        Else
           Exclude(rid)                    
        End If
    Else 
        Exclude(rid)
        
    End If
        
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: Post16Filter
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal
    Dim result As Decimal = 0
    
    Dim AcademyFilter As Decimal = Products.AY1718_GlobalVariables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim BudgetID As String = DataSets.Administration.Providers.Funding_Streams.Budget(2017181)
    Dim PrevMaintained As Boolean = DataSets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_New_Opener
 
    
    If String.IsNullOrEmpty(budgetID) Then
    
        Exclude(RID)    
    
    Else 
    
        If AcademyFilter = 17183 And BudgetID.Contains ("YPLRE") then         
        
        result = 2
        
        Else
           
           If AcademyFilter = 17183 And BudgetID.Contains ("ZCONV") then         
            
            result = 1
            
            Else
            
                If AcademyFilter = 17183 And ((BudgetID.Contains ("YPLRC") Or BudgetID.Contains ("YPLRA") Or BudgetID.Contains("YPLRD")) And PrevMaintained = True) then
                
                result = 3
                
                Else
                
                result = 0
                
                End If
                
            End If
            
        End If
        
    End If
    
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: P027_DaysOpen
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal
    Dim result = 0
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    
                                                                                                    
      Dim Funding_Basis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
      Dim DateOpened As Date = [datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened]
      Dim ConvertDate As Date = [datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Convert_Date]
      Dim DateUsed As Date
      Dim Days_Open As Decimal = 0
      
      If ConvertDate >= DateOpened Then
                                   DateUsed = ConvertDate
       Else
                                   DateUsed = DateOpened
      End If                                  
                                   
    
     Print(DateOpened, "Date Opened", rid)
     Print(ConvertDate, "Convert Date",rid)
     Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
     Print(Funding_Basis,"Funding_Basis",rid)
    
     
     
      If F100_AllAcademies > 0 then
         
             Days_Open = DateDiff("d", DateUsed, "1 September 2018")
              
   
            Print(Days_Open, "Number of Days Open to end 1718", rid) 
            Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies", rid)
        
        if Days_Open > 365 then

            result = 365

        else

            result = Days_Open
    
        End if
      
        
      else
      exclude(rid)
     End If 
 
    Return result
End Function

Name: P028_MonthsOpen
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal
    Dim result As Decimal = 0
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim DateOpened As Date = [datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened]
    Dim ConvertDate As Date = [datasets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Convert_Date]
    Dim DateUsed As Date 
    Dim Months_Open As Decimal = 0
    
    If ConvertDate >= DateOpened Then
                                   DateUsed = ConvertDate
                                Else
                                   DateUsed = DateOpened
   End If     

    
    Months_Open =  DateDiff("m", DateUsed, "1 September 2017")
    
    If F100_AllAcademies > 0 then 
            If Months_Open < 12 then    
            Result = Months_Open                'does this need To be /12 ie For an academy oepning October this would be 11/12ths?
            Else
            Result = 12
            End If
    Else        
    Exclude(rid)
    End If
    
    Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
    Print(Months_Open, "Number of Months Open", rid)
    Print(ConvertDate, "Convert Date", rid)
    Print(DateOpened, "Date Opened", rid)
    
    Return result
End Function

    Print(MFG1617_Base_Link, "1617 MFG - Live", rid)

    Print(AcType, "Academy type", rid)
      
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Then

            result = SBS1617_Base_Link + MFG1617_Base_Link

        End If
    
    End If 

    Return result
    
End Function

    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)

Name: P08_TotalLumpSum
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal
    Dim result = 0
    
     Dim AcType As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
     Dim AddLumpSum As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P07_AddLumpSum
     Dim LumpSumPri As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P241_priLumpSumSubtotal
     Dim LumpSumSec As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P245_SecLumpSumSubtotal
     Dim FringeAdj As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.London_Fringe
     Dim LondonFringe As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.London_Fringe    
     Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
     Dim FringeAdjString As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.London_Fringe    
     Dim FringeCensusString As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.London_Fringe

    Dim FringeFactor As Decimal
    
    If String.IsNullOrEmpty(FringeAdjString) then
    
        FringeFactor = LondonFringe
    
    Else
    
        FringeFactor = FringeAdj
    
    End If
    
    If String.IsNullOrEmpty(FringeAdjString) And
    string.IsNullOrEmpty(FringeCensusString) then
    
        FringeFactor = 1
    
    End if
    
        If FundingBasis = "Place" Then
    
            exclude(rid) 
                                      
        Else
    
            If AcType = 17181 then
      
                result =  (AddLumpSum + LumpSumPri + LumpSumSec) * LondonFringe 
        
            Else 
        
                exclude(rid)
        
            End if
    
        End If 
    
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: P12_MFG_Baseline
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal
    Dim result = 0
                 
    Dim AcType As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim MFG_P04 As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P04_1617_MFG_Base_Funding
    Dim MFG_P05 As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P05_1617_BaseExclusions
    Dim MFG_P06 As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P06_1617_BaseTechAdj
    Dim MFG_P08 As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P08_TotalLumpSum
    Dim MFG_P09 As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P09_1718_Sparsity
    Dim MFG_P10 As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P10_PriorYr_NegAdj      
    Dim MFG_P11 As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P11_PriorYr_PosAdj 
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    
    Print(MFG_P04, "MFG base funding",rid)  
    Print(MFG_P05, "Base Exclusions",rid)
    Print(MFG_P06, "Base Tech Adj",rid)
    Print(MFG_P08, "Baseline Lump Sum Deduction", rid)
    Print(MFG_P09, "Baseline Sparsity Deduction", rid)
    Print(MFG_P10, "Prior Year EFA Negative Adjustment", rid)                       
    Print(MFG_P11, "Prior Year EFA Positive Adjustment", rid)
    
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Then
    
    exclude(rid) 
    
    Else
    
    IF AcType = 17181 Then
    
    result =  MFG_P04 - MFG_P05 - MFG_P06 - MFG_P08 - MFG_P09 - MFG_P10 + MFG_P11
    
    Else
    
    'EXCLUDE PROVIDERS NOT IN SCOPE
    Exclude(rid)  
    
    End If
    
    End If
    
    Return result
    
End Function

     Dim HNPre16 As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P36_1617_pre16_HN
     Dim APPre16 As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P37_1617_pre16_AP
     Dim HospPre16 As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P38_1617_HN_Hosp_Pl  
     Dim TotalHN As Decimal = Persisted.Report_AY1617_Acad_NOR:NOR_AY201617_Report.P27b_Total_HN_MFG    
     Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
     Dim DateOpen As Date = DataSets.Administration.Providers.Provider_Information.Date_Opened 
           
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Then
     
        exclude(rid) 
    
    Else
     
        If AcType = 17181 then
         
            If DateOpen <= "01 March 2016" then

            End If  
          
        Else 
         
            exclude(rid)
         
        End if 
    
    End If 
    
    Return result

    Dim result = 0
        
     Dim AcType As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
     Dim LumpSumPri As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P241_priLumpSumSubtotal
     Dim LumpSumSec As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P245_SecLumpSumSubtotal
     Dim Ex1 As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P261_Ex1Subtotal
     Dim FringeCensus As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.London_Fringe
     Dim FringeAdj As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.London_Fringe
     Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
     Dim FringeAdjString As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.London_Fringe
     Dim FringeCensusString As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.London_Fringe

     Dim FringeFactor As Decimal
    
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(FringeAdjString) then
        
        FringeFactor = FringeCensus
        
        Else
        
        FringeFactor = FringeAdj
        
        End If

            If string.IsNullOrEmpty(FringeAdjString) And string.IsNullOrEmpty(FringeCensusString) then
            
            FringeFactor = 1
     
            End if
            
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Then
    
        exclude(rid) 
    
    Else
    
        If AcType = 17181 then
                
                Result = FringeFactor * (LumpSumPri + LumpSumSec + Ex1)
   
        Else 
        
            exclude(rid)
    
        End If 
        
    End If
    
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: P36a_MFG_Adj
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal
    Dim result = 0
     
    Dim AcType As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim Guarantee As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P35a_GuaranteedFunding
    Dim Base As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P28_1718_Total_MFG
    
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
   
    Print(Guarantee, "Guaranteed Funding", rid)
    Print(Base, "1718 Adjusted SBS Budget", rid)
    
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Then
    
        exclude(rid) 
    
    Else
                                   
        If AcType = 17181 then
        
            If Guarantee > Base then
            
                result = Guarantee - Base
                
            else
           
                result = 0
                
            End if    
           
        Else 
    
            exclude(rid)

        End If 
    
    End If 
       
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: P42_Apply_Cap_Decision
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim AcType As String = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim CapScale As String = Products.1718_MFG.P40_CapScale_YN
    Dim GrowingSchool As String = Products.1718_MFG.P41_GrowingSchool_YN
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    
    Print(CapScale, "Capping scale applied", rid)
    Print(GrowingSchool, "Growing school", rid)     
    
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Then  
    
        exclude(rid) 
    
    Else
    
        If AcType = 17181 Then                                                                                               
        
            If CapScale = "Yes" Then 
        
                If GrowingSchool = "No" then
                
                    Result = 1
                
                Else 
                
                    Result = 0
            
                End If 
        
            Else Result = 0
        
            End If 
    
    'EXCLUDE PROVIDERS Not In SCOPE
    
        Else 
        
            exclude(rid)
        
        End if
        
    End If 
    
    Return result
    
End Function

Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product

    Dim AcType As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies

    Dim ScaleFacApp As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P47a_Scale_Factor_Applied
    Dim AdjNOR1718 As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P33a_1718_Adjusted_NOR
    Dim MFGPP1617 As Decimal = Products.1718_MFG.P18a_1617_MFGPerPupil

    Print(ApplyCapDec, "Apply cap decision", rid)
                                           
    If FundingBasis = "Place" Then
    
        exclude(rid)

    'EXCLUDE PROVIDERS Not In SCOPE       
    
        Else 
    
            exclude(rid)
            
        End if
    
    End If 
    
    Return Result

Name: P005_PriBESubtotal
Script:
Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
   Dim result = 0
   
            Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double =   Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies            
            Dim FundingBasis As String =        Datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181) 
            Dim PrimaryPupils As Double =       Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS      
            Dim P004_PriRate As Double =        Products.1718_SBS.P004_PriRate            
            Dim P005_Pri_BESubtotal As Double = PrimaryPupils * P004_PriRate
            Dim P005_Pri_BESubtotalAPT As Double = [datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Basic_Entitlement_Primary] 
  
            Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies",rid)
            Print(FundingBasis, "FundingBasis", rid)
            Print(PrimaryPupils,"PrimaryPupils",rid)
            Print(P004_PriRate,"P004_PriRate",rid) 
            Print(P005_Pri_BESubtotal,"P005_Pri_BESubtotal",rid) 
            
If FundingBasis = "Place" Then 

    exclude(rid)
    
Else     

    If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = "Estimate") Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = "Estimate") THEN
         
         Result = P005_Pri_BESubtotal
    
    Else
                  
        If (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = "Census") Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = "Census")  THEN
            
            'Print(P005_Pri_BESubtotalAPT,"P005_Pri_BESubtotalAPT",rid)

            Result = P005_Pri_BESubtotalAPT
       
        Else 

            exclude(rid)

        End If
      
   
    End If 
                    
End If
     
                    
     Return result
      
End Function

Name: P019_PriFSMFactor
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim FSMCensus As Double = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Primary_FSM_Proportion
    Dim FSMAdj As Double = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Primary_FSM_Proportion
    Dim FSMAdjString as string = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Primary_FSM_Proportion
    Dim FSMPriCensusString as string  = Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Primary_FSM_Proportion
    Dim LA_AV As Double = latoprov(Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Local_Authority_Averages.Local_Authority_Averages.Primary_FSM_Proportion)

        If (F200_SBS_Academies = 1) Then

        Print(LA_AV,"LA average", rid)
        Print(FSMCensus, "FSMPri Census", rid)
        Print(FSMAdj, "FSM Pri Adjusted", rid)  

            If string.IsNullOrEmpty(FSMPriCensusString) And string.IsNullOrEmpty(FSMAdjString) THEN 
                   Result = LA_AV
        
            Elseif string.IsNullOrEmpty(FSMAdjString) then
                   Result = FSMCensus
  
            Else
                
                  Result = FSMAdj
            
            End if
        
        else
            
            exclude(rid)
            
        End If 
        
     Return result
    
End Function

Name: P022_PriFSMSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As String = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis  
    Dim P22_Total_NOR_Pri_SBS As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS
    Dim P021_PriFSMRate As Double =   Products.1718_SBS.P021_PriFSMRate
    Dim P019_PriFSMFactor As Double = Products.1718_SBS.P019_PriFSMFactor 
    Dim P022_PriFSMSubtotal As Double =  P22_Total_NOR_Pri_SBS * P021_PriFSMRate * P019_PriFSMFactor
    Dim FSMSelectedbyLA As String = LaToProv(Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.FSM_Primary_FSM/FSM6)    
    Dim P022_PriFSMSubtotalAPT As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Free_School_Meals_Primary]
   
    Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
    Print(F900_FundingBasis,"F900_FundingBasis",rid)
    Print(P22_Total_NOR_Pri_SBS,"P22_Total_NOR_Pri_SBS",rid)
    Print(P021_PriFSMRate,"P021_PriFSMRate",rid)
    Print(P019_PriFSMFactor,"P019_PriFSMFactor",rid)    
    
    If F900_FundingBasis = 3 Then
        
    exclude(rid)
    
    Else

    If (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And F900_FundingBasis = 2) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And F900_FundingBasis = 2)Then
            Result = P022_PriFSMSubtotal 
        
    Else 

    If  (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And F900_FundingBasis = 1) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And F900_FundingBasis = 1)Then
                                            
        If FSMSelectedbyLA = "FSM % Primary" Then
           Result = P022_PriFSMSubtotalAPT
           
        End If    
       
          
     Else
                            
     End If    
     
      Exclude(rid)
                    
      End If
  
      End If
         
    Return result
    
End Function

    End If

Name: P033_SecFSMSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Double
    Dim result = 0
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim F900_FundingBasis As String = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim P25_TotalNORSecSBS As Double = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS
    Dim P032_SecFSMRate As Double =   Products.1718_SBS.P032_SecFSMRate
    Dim P030_SecFSMFactor As Double = Products.1718_SBS.P030_SecFSMFactor 
    Dim P033_SecFSMSubtotal As Double =  P25_TotalNORSecSBS * P032_SecFSMRate * P030_SecFSMFactor
    Dim P001_1718DaysOpen As Double = Products.1718_SBS.P001_1718DaysOpen
    Dim FSMSelectedbyLA As String = LaToProv(Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.FSM_Secondary_FSM/FSM6)
    Dim P033_SecFSMSubtotalAPT As Double = [Datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Free_School_Meals_Secondary]
                            
               
    Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies",rid)
    Print(F900_FundingBasis,"F900_FundingBasis",rid)
    Print(P25_TotalNORSecSBS,"P25_TotalNORSecSBS",rid)
    Print(P032_SecFSMRate,"P032_SecFSMRate",rid)
    Print(P030_SecFSMFactor,"P030_SecFSMFactor",rid) 
    Print(FSMSelectedbyLA,"FSMSelectedbyLA",rid)
    Print(P033_SecFSMSubtotalAPT,"P033_SecFSMSubtotalAPT",rid)
  
    If F900_FundingBasis = 3 Then
        
        Exclude(rid)
    
    Else
                   
    End if
        
           
     If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And F900_FundingBasis = 2) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And F900_FundingBasis = 2)   Then

        Result = P033_SecFSMSubtotal 
        
     Else                                                                     
  
        If (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And F900_FundingBasis = 1) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And F900_FundingBasis = 1) Then
      
            If FSMSelectedbyLA = "FSM % Secondary" Then
                                 
                Result = P033_SecFSMSubtotalAPT
                            
            Else
                            
                Result = 0
                            
            End If
      
        Else 
                    
        Exclude(rid)
                    
        End If
  
      End if
            
       
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: P041_IDACIFPriFactor
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim [Census_Pupil_Characteristics_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F]  As Double = [datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F]
    Dim [APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F] As Double = [datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F]
    Dim [Local_Authority_Averages_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F] As Double = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Local_Authority_Averages.Local_Authority_Averages.IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F])
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim IDACIFPriAdjString as string = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F
    Dim IDACIFPriCensusString as string  = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F

    
    If AcadFilter = 1 Then
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(IDACIFPriAdjString) And string.IsNullOrEmpty(IDACIFPriCensusString) Then
            result = [Local_Authority_Averages_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F] 
        Else
            If string.IsNullOrEmpty(IDACIFPriAdjString) Then
                result = [Census_Pupil_Characteristics_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F]
            Else
                result = [APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F]   
            End if
        End if    
    Else
        exclude(rid)
    End if
 
    Print(Census_Pupil_Characteristics_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F, "Census_Pupil_Characteristics_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F", rid) 
    Print(APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F, "APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F", rid) 
    Print(Local_Authority_Averages_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F, "Local_Authority_Averages_IDACI_Primary_Proportion_Band_F", rid) 
    
    Return result
End Function

Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim SBS_P22 As Decimal = products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS
    Dim P043_IDACIFPriRate As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P043_IDACIFPriRate
    Dim P041_IDACIFPriFactor As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P041_IDACIFPriFactor
    Dim APT_ISB_IDACIF_Primary As Decimal = [datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.IDACI_(P_F)]
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim FundingBasis As decimal =  products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    
    If AcadFilter =1 then    
        If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = 2 ) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = 2) Then       
            Result = SBS_P22*P043_IDACIFPriRate*P041_IDACIFPriFactor 
        ElseIf F100_AllAcademies <> 17181 And FundingBasis = 1  Then 
            result = APT_ISB_IDACIF_Primary
        Else
            Exclude(rid)
        End If
    else
        exclude(rid)
    End if
        
    
    Print(SBS_P22, "SBS_P22", rid)
    Print(P043_IDACIFPriRate, "P043_IDACIFPriRate", rid)
    Print(P041_IDACIFPriFactor, "P041_IDACIFPriFactor", rid)
    Print(APT_ISB_IDACIF_Primary, "APT_ISB_IDACIF_Primary", rid)
    Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
    Print(FundingBasis,"Funding_Basis",rid)
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P050_IDACIEPriSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim SBS_P22 As Decimal = products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS
    Dim P049_IDACIEPriRate As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P049_IDACIEPriRate
    Dim P047_IDACIEPriFactor As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P047_IDACIEPriFactor
    Dim APT_ISB_IDACIE_Primary As Decimal = [datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.IDACI_(P_E)]
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim FundingBasis As decimal =  products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    
    If AcadFilter = 1 then    
        If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = 2 ) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = 2) Then       
            Result = SBS_P22*P049_IDACIEPriRate*P047_IDACIEPriFactor 
        ElseIf F100_AllAcademies <> 17181 And FundingBasis = 1  Then 
                result = APT_ISB_IDACIE_Primary
        Else
            Exclude(rid)
        End If
    else
        exclude(rid)
    End if
        
    
    Print(SBS_P22, "SBS_P22", rid)
    Print(P049_IDACIEPriRate, "P049_IDACIEPriRate", rid)
    Print(P047_IDACIEPriFactor, "P047_IDACIEPriFactor", rid)
    Print(APT_ISB_IDACIE_Primary, "APT_ISB_IDACIE_Primary", rid)
    Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
    Print(FundingBasis,"Funding_Basis",rid)
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P068_IDACIBPriSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim SBS_P22 As Decimal = products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS
    Dim P067_IDACIBPriRate As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P067_IDACIBPriRate
    Dim P065_IDACIBPriFactor As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P065_IDACIBPriFactor
    Dim APT_ISB_IDACIB_Primary As Decimal = [datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.IDACI_(P_B)]
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim FundingBasis As decimal =  products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    
    If AcadFilter = 1 then    
        If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = 2 ) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = 2) Then       
            Result = SBS_P22*P067_IDACIBPriRate*P065_IDACIBPriFactor 
        ElseIf F100_AllAcademies <> 17181 And FundingBasis = 1  Then 
            result = APT_ISB_IDACIB_Primary
        Else
            Exclude(rid)
        End If
    else
        exclude(rid)
    End if
        
    
    Print(SBS_P22, "SBS_P22", rid)
    Print(P067_IDACIBPriRate, "P067_IDACIBPriRate", rid)
    Print(P065_IDACIBPriFactor, "P065_IDACIBPriFactor", rid)
    Print(APT_ISB_IDACIB_Primary, "APT_ISB_IDACIB_Primary", rid)
    Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
    Print(FundingBasis,"Funding_Basis",rid)
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P086_IDACIESecSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim SBS_P25 As Decimal = products.1718_NOR.NOR_P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS
    Dim P085_IDACIESecRate As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P085_IDACIESecRate
    Dim P083_IDACIESecFactor As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P083_IDACIESecFactor
    Dim APT_ISB_IDACIE_Secondary As Decimal = [datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.IDACI_(S_E)]
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim FundingBasis As decimal=  products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    
    If AcadFilter = 1 then    
        If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = 2 ) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = 2) Then       
            Result = SBS_P25 * P085_IDACIESecRate * P083_IDACIESecFactor 
        ElseIf F100_AllAcademies <> 17181 And FundingBasis = 2  Then 
            result = APT_ISB_IDACIE_Secondary
        Else

    else
        exclude(rid)
    End if

    Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
    Print(FundingBasis,"Funding_Basis",rid)
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As String = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim LACCensus As Double = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.LAC__X_Proportion
    Dim LACAdj As Double = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.LAC_X_Proportion
    Dim LACAdjString as string = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.LAC_X_Proportion
    Dim LACCensusString as string  = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.LAC__X_Proportion
    Dim LA_AV As Double = latoprov(datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Local_Authority_Averages.Local_Authority_Averages.LAC__X_Proportion)    
 
If F200_SBS_Academies = 1 then
    If string.IsNullOrEmpty(LACAdjString) And string.IsNullOrEmpty(LACCensusString) THEN
        Result = 0
    else 
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(LACAdjString) THEN
            Result = LACCensus
        ELSE
            Result = LACAdj
        End if
     End If
else
    exclude(rid)
End if

      Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
      Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)
      Print(LA_AV, "LA average", rid)
      Print(LACCensus, "LACCensus", rid)
      Print(LACAdj, "LACAdj", rid) 
      Print(LACAdjString, "LACAdjString", rid)
      Print(LACCensusString, "LACCensusString", rid) 
      
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: P117_LACSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P114_LACFactor As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P114_LACFactor
    Dim P116_LACRate As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P116_LACRate
    Dim P26_Total_NOR_SBS As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P26_Total_NOR_SBS
    Dim P117_LACSubtotal As Decimal = P26_Total_NOR_SBS * P116_LACRate * P114_LACFactor
    Dim LAC As Decimal = [DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.IDACI_(S_A)]
    
       If F200_SBS_Academies <> 1 Then                                                       
          exclude(rid)
       End if
        
       If (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  
          result = P117_LACSubtotal
       Else 
          If (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  'new opener
            Result = LAC
          End If  
       End If   
        
      Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
      Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)
      Print(F200_SBS_Academies, "F200_SBS_Academies", rid)
      Print(P114_LACFactor, "P114_LACFactor", rid)
      Print(P116_LACRate, "P116_LACRate", rid)
      Print(P26_Total_NOR_SBS, "P26_Total_NOR_SBS", rid)
      Print(LAC, "LAC", rid)
      
    Return result
End Function

    Dim LAAV_Y25P73 As Decimal = LaToProv([DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Local_Authority_Averages.Local_Authority_Averages.Low_Attainment_under_old_EYFSP_Proportion_73])

     If F200_SBS_Academies = 1 then

    End If
            
      
      Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)

      Print(LAAV_Y25P73, "LAAV_Y25P73", rid)

    Return result
End Function

Name: P139_SecPASubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P138_SecPARate As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P138_SecPARate
    Dim P138a_SecPA_Y7Factor As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P138a_SecPA_AdjustedSecFactor
    Dim P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS
    Dim calc As Decimal = P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS * P138_SecPARate * P138a_SecPA_Y7Factor
    Dim PA_Secondary As Decimal = DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Low_Attainment_S
         
       If F200_SBS_Academies <> 1 Then
          exclude(rid)
        End if
        
       If (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  
          result = calc
          Else 
          If (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  'new opener
          Result = PA_Secondary
          End If  
       End If   
         
 
       
      Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
      Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)
      Print(F200_SBS_Academies, "F200_SBS_Academies", rid)
      Print(P138_SecPARate, "P138_SecPARate", rid)
      Print(P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS, "P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS", rid)
      Print(PA_Secondary, "PA_Secondary", rid)
      Print(calc, "calc", rid)
      
    Return result
End Function

Name: P138a_SecPA_AdjustedSecFactor
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    Dim F200 As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P08a_Y7 As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P08a_Y7
    Dim P08b_Y8to11 As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P08b_Y8to11
    Dim P136_SecPA_Y7Factor As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P136_SecPAFactor_Y7Factor
    Dim P136a_SecPA_Y7NationalWeight As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P136a_SecPA_Y7NationalWeight 
    Dim P137_SecPA_Y8to11Factor As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P137_SecPA_Y8to11Factor
    
    If F200 = 1 then
    
        result = ((P136_SecPA_Y7Factor * P08a_Y7 * P136a_SecPA_Y7NationalWeight) + (P137_SecPA_Y8to11Factor * P08b_Y8to11)) / (P08a_Y7 + P08b_Y8to11)
    
    Else
    
        exclude(rid)
    
    End if
    
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: P145_EAL1PriSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double =       Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal =           Products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Double =      Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P142_EAL1PriFactor As Decimal =     Products.1718_SBS.P142_EAL1PriFactor
    Dim P144_EAL1PriRate As Decimal =       Products.1718_SBS.P144_EAL1PriRate
    Dim P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS As Decimal =  Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS
    Dim calc As Decimal =                   P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS * P144_EAL1PriRate * P142_EAL1PriFactor
    Dim EAL_P As Decimal =                  LAToProv([DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.EAL_P])
    
       If F200_SBS_Academies <> 1 Then
          exclude(rid)
        End if
        
       If (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  
          result = calc
          Else 
          If (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  'new opener
            If P144_EAL1PriRate>0           
            Result = EAL_P
            Else Result = 0
            End If
          End If  
       End If   
         
       
       
      Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
      Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)
      Print(F200_SBS_Academies, "F200_SBS_Academies", rid)
      Print(P142_EAL1PriFactor, "P142_EAL1PriFactor", rid)
      Print(P144_EAL1PriRate, "P144_EAL1PriRate", rid)
      Print(P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS, "P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SB", rid)
      Print(EAL_P, "EAL_P", rid)
      Print(calc, "calc", rid)
      
    Return result
End Function

Name: P147_EAL2PriFactor
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    
    Dim acadfilter As Decimal =                 Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As String =                Datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Decimal =         Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim EALPrimP2PupilCharac_String As String = [DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.EAL_2_Primary_Proportion]
    Dim EALPrimaryP2Adj_String As String =      [DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.EAL_2_Primary_Proportion]
    Dim LAAV_EALPrimP2 As Decimal =             LaToProv([DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Local_Authority_Averages.Local_Authority_Averages.EAL_2_Primary_Proportion])    
    Dim PupilCharacCensusEALP2 As Decimal =     [DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.EAL_2_Primary_Proportion]
    Dim AdjEALP2 As Decimal =                   [DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.EAL_2_Primary_Proportion]

If FundingBasis = "Place" Then 
                   
    exclude(rid)
    
Else     
    
    If acadfilter = 17181 Or acadfilter = 17182 Or acadfilter = 17183 Then 
    
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(EALPrimP2PupilCharac_String) And String.IsNullOrEmpty(EALPrimaryP2Adj_String) Then

            End If

        End If

    Else 
    
        exclude(rid)    

    End If
            
End If 
  
      Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)
      Print(F200_SBS_Academies, "F200_SBS_Academies", rid)
      Print(EALPrimP2PupilCharac_String, "EALPrimP2PupilCharac_String", rid)
      Print(EALPrimaryP2Adj_String, "EALPrimaryP2Adj_String", rid)
      Print(LAAV_EALPrimP2, "LAAV_EALPrimP2", rid)
      Print(PupilCharacCensusEALP2, "PupilCharacCensusEALP2", rid)
      Print(AdjEALP2, "AdjEALP2", rid)
      
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P150_EAL2PriSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double =       Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As String =            Datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Double =      Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P149_EAL2PriRate As Decimal =       Products.1718_SBS.P149_EAL2PriRate
    Dim P147_EAL2PriFactor As Decimal =     Products.1718_SBS.P147_EAL2PriFactor
    Dim P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS As Decimal =  Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS
    Dim calc As Decimal =                   P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS * P149_EAL2PriRate * P147_EAL2PriFactor 
    Dim EAL_P As Decimal =                  LAToProv([DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.EAL_P])
    
If FundingBasis = "Place" Then

    exclude(rid)                                                                                     
    
Else 

    If (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Or (FundingBasis = "Estimate" And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = "Estimate" And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) Then   

        result = calc
        
    Else 
  
        If (FundingBasis = "Census" And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = "Census" And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) Then   'new opener
    
            If P149_EAL2PriRate > 0
            
                Result = EAL_P
        
            Else
                
                Result = 0
                
            End If
  
        Else 
        
            exclude(rid)
            
        End If  

    End If   
         
End If        
      
    Return result
    
End Function

Name: P161_EAL1SecSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
     Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P160_EAL1SecRate As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P160_EAL1SecRate
    Dim P158_EAL1SecFactor As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P158_EAL1SecFactor
    Dim P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS
    Dim calc As Decimal = P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS * P160_EAL1SecRate * P158_EAL1SecFactor
    Dim EAL_S As Decimal = LAToProv(DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.EAL_S)
    
       If F200_SBS_Academies <> 1 Then
          exclude(rid)
        End if                                       
        
       If (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  
          result = calc
          Else 
          If (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  'new opener
            If P160_EAL1SecRate>0           
            Result = EAL_S
            Else Result = 0
            End If
          End If  
       End If   
         
       
       
      Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
      Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)
      Print(F200_SBS_Academies, "F200_SBS_Academies", rid)
      Print(P160_EAL1SecRate, "P160_EAL1SecRate", rid)
      Print(P158_EAL1SecFactor, "P158_EAL1SecFactor", rid)
      Print(P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS, "P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS", rid)
      Print(EAL_S, "EAL_S", rid)
      Print(calc, "calc", rid)
      
    Return result
End Function

Name: P166_EAL2SecSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
     Dim F100_AllAcademies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Double = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P165_EAL2SecRate As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P165_EAL2SecRate
    Dim P163_EAL2SecFactor As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P163_EAL2SecFactor
    Dim P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS As Decimal = Products.1718_NOR.NOR_P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS
    Dim calc As Decimal = P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS * P165_EAL2SecRate * P163_EAL2SecFactor
    Dim EAL_S As Decimal = LAToProv(DataSets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.EAL_S)
    
       If F200_SBS_Academies <> 1 Then
          exclude(rid)
        End if                            
        
       If (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 2 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  
          result = calc
          Else 
          If (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17182) Or (FundingBasis = 1 And F100_AllAcademies = 17183) then  'new opener
            If P165_EAL2SecRate>0           
            Result = EAL_S
            Else Result = 0
            End If
          End If  
       End If   
         
       
       
      Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
      Print(FundingBasis,"FundingBasis",rid)
      Print(F200_SBS_Academies, "F200_SBS_Academies", rid)
      Print(P165_EAL2SecRate, "P165_EAL2SecRate", rid)
      Print(P163_EAL2SecFactor, "P163_EAL2SecFactor", rid)
      Print(P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS, "P25_Total_NOR_SEC_SBS", rid)
      Print(EAL_S, "EAL_S", rid)
      Print(calc, "calc", rid)
      
      
    Return result
End Function

Name: P174_MobPriFactor
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim [Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Mobility_Primary_Proportion]  As Double = [datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Mobility_Primary_Proportion]
    Dim [APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Mobility_Primary_Proportion] As Double = [datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Mobility_Primary_Proportion]
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
     Dim ModPriProAdjString as string = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Mobility_Primary_Proportion
    
    If AcadFilter = 1 Then
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(ModPriProAdjString) Then 
            If [Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Mobility_Primary_Proportion]>0.1 Then
                result = [Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Mobility_Primary_Proportion] -0.1
            Else 
                result = 0
            End if
        Else 
            If [APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Mobility_Primary_Proportion]>0.1 Then
                result = [APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Mobility_Primary_Proportion] -0.1
            Else 
                result = 0
            End if
        End if
    Else
        exclude(rid)
    End if
    
    
 
    Print(Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Mobility_Primary_Proportion, "Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Mobility_Primary_Proportion", rid) 
    Print(APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Mobility_Primary_Proportion, "APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Mobility_Primary_Proportion", rid) 
     
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P177_MobPriSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim SBS_P22 As Decimal = products.1718_NOR.NOR_P22_Total_NOR_PRI_SBS
    Dim P174_MobPriFactor As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P174_MobPriFactor
    Dim P176_MobPriRate As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P176_MobPriRate
    Dim APT_ISB_Mobility_Primary As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Mobility_P
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim F200 As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies


    If F200 = 1 then
    
        If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = 2 ) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = 2) Then       
        Result = SBS_P22*P176_MobPriRate*P174_MobPriFactor 
        ElseIf F100_AllAcademies <> 17181 And FundingBasis = 1 Then 
        result = APT_ISB_Mobility_Primary
        Else
        Exclude(rid)
        End If
    
    Else 
        
        exclude(rid)

    End if
        
    Print(SBS_P22, "SBS_P22", rid)
    Print(P174_MobPriFactor, "P174_MobPriFactor", rid)
    Print(P176_MobPriRate, "P176_MobPriRate", rid)
    Print(APT_ISB_Mobility_Primary, "APT_ISB_Mobility_Primary", rid)
    Print(F100_AllAcademies,"F100_AllAcademies",rid)
    Print(FundingBasis,"Funding_Basis",rid)
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P179_InYearMobPriSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim P177_MobPriSubtotal As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P177_MobPriSubtotal
    Dim P001_1718DaysOpen As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P001_1718DaysOpen
    Dim Year_Days1718 As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.P025_YearDays_1718
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
