Name: P185a_Phase
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Phase As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Phase 
    Dim Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Phase As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Phase
    Dim PhaseString As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.Phase
    
    Print(APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Phase, "APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Phase", rid)
    Print(Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Phase, "Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Phase", rid)
 
If AcadFilter = 1 Then                                 
    If string.IsNullOrEmpty(PhaseString) Then
        If Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Phase = "Primary" Then
            result = 1      
        Else If Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Phase =  "Middle-deemed Primary" Then
            result = 2
        Else If Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Phase = "Secondary" Then
            result = 3
        Else If Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Phase = "Middle-deemed Secondary" Then
            result = 4
        Else If Census_Pupil_Characteristics_Phase = "All-through" Then
            result = 5
        Else
            result = 0
        End If
    Else    
        If  APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Phase = "Primary" Then
            result = 1
        Else If APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Phase =  "Middle-deemed Primary" Then
            result = 2
        Else If APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Phase = "Secondary" Then
            result = 3
        Else If APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Phase = "Middle-deemed Secondary" Then
            result = 4
        Else If APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments_Phase = "All-through" Then
            result = 5
        Else
            result = 0
        End If
    End If
Else
exclude(rid)
End If
    
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product

    Dim SecLumpSum As Decimal = LAtoProv(datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.Sparsity_Secondary_Lump_Sum)

Name: p192_SparsityDistThreshold
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim Phase As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P185a_Phase
    Dim PriDistanceThreshold As Decimal = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.Primary_Distance_Threshold])
    Dim MidDistanceThreshold As Decimal = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.Middle_School_Distance_Threshold])
    Dim SecDistanceThreshold As Decimal = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.Secondary_Distance_Threshold])
    Dim AllthruDistanceThreshold As Decimal = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.All-Through_Distance_Threshold])
    Dim PriDistanceThresholdString As String = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.Primary_Distance_Threshold])
    Dim MidDistanceThresholdString As String = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.Middle_School_Distance_Threshold])
    Dim SecDistanceThresholdString As String = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.Secondary_Distance_Threshold])
    Dim AllthruDistanceThresholdString As String = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.All-Through_Distance_Threshold])
      
    
If AcadFilter = 1 Then 
    If Phase = 1 Then
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(PriDistanceThresholdString) Then
        result = 2
        Else
        result = PriDistanceThreshold
        End if
   Else If Phase = 2 Or Phase = 4 Then
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(MidDistanceThresholdString) Then
        result = 2
        Else
        result = MidDistanceThreshold
        End if
   Else If Phase = 3 Then
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(SecDistanceThresholdString) Then
        result = 3
        Else
        result = SecDistanceThreshold
        End if 
   Else If Phase = 5 Then
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(AllthruDistanceThresholdString) Then
        result = 2
        Else
        result = AllthruDistanceThreshold
        End if
    Else
    result = 0    
    End if        
Else
exclude(rid)
End if
    
    Print(Phase, "Phase", rid)  
    Print(PriDistanceThreshold, "PriDistanceThreshold", rid)
    Print(MidDistanceThreshold, "MidDistanceThreshold", rid)
    Print(SecDistanceThreshold, "SecDistanceThreshold", rid)
    Print(AllthruDistanceThreshold, "AllthruDistanceThreshold", rid)
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P197_SparsitylumpSumSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
  
    Dim Phase As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P185a_Phase
    Dim P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri
    Dim P193_SparsityDistMet_YN   As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P193_SparsityDistMet_YN
    Dim P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN  As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN
    Dim P190_SparsityUnit         As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P190_SparsityUnit
    Dim P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid
    Dim P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec
    Dim P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru
    Dim APT_ISB_SparsityFunding As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Sparsity_Funding
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
        
If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = 2 ) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = 2) Then       
        If Phase = 1 And P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri = 0 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit
        Else
        result = 0
               
        If Phase = 2 And P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid = 0 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit
        Else
        result = 0
        
        If Phase = 4 And P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid = 0 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit
        Else
        result = 0
              
        If Phase = 3 And P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec = 0 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit
        Else
        result = 0
        
        If Phase = 5 And P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru = 0 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit
        Else
        result = 0
        End if
        End if
        End if
        End if
        End if
ElseIf F100_AllAcademies <> 17181 And FundingBasis = 1  Then 
result = APT_ISB_SparsityFunding
Else
Exclude(rid)
End If
    
    
    Print(Phase, "Phase", rid)
    Print(P190_SparsityUnit, "P190_SparsityUnit", rid)
    Print(P193_SparsityDistMet_YN, "P193_SparsityDistMet_YN", rid)
    Print(P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN, "P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN", rid)
    Print(P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri, "P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri", rid)
    Print(P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid, "P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid", rid)
    Print(P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec, "P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec", rid)
    Print(P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru, "P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru", rid)
    Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_Academies", rid)
    Print(FundingBasis, "FundingBasis", rid)
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P198_SparsityTaperSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
  
    Dim Phase As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P185a_Phase
    Dim P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri
    Dim P193_SparsityDistMet_YN   As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P193_SparsityDistMet_YN
    Dim P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN  As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN
    Dim P190_SparsityUnit         As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P190_SparsityUnit
    Dim P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid
    Dim P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec
    Dim P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru
    Dim APT_ISB_SparsityFunding As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Sparsity_Funding
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim P194_SparsityAveYGSize As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P194_SparsityAveYGSize
    Dim P195_SparsityYGThreshold As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P195_SparsityYGThreshold
    
    
        
If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = 2 ) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = 2) Then       
        If Phase = 1 And P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri = 1 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit * (1-(P194_SparsityAveYGSize/P195_SparsityYGThreshold))
        Else
        result = 0
               
        If Phase = 2 And P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid = 1 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit * (1-(P194_SparsityAveYGSize/P195_SparsityYGThreshold))
        Else
        result = 0
        
        If Phase = 4 And P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid = 1 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit * (1-(P194_SparsityAveYGSize/P195_SparsityYGThreshold))
        Else
        result = 0
               
        If Phase = 3 And P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec =1 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit * (1-(P194_SparsityAveYGSize/P195_SparsityYGThreshold))
        Else
        result = 0
        
        If Phase = 5 And P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru = 1 And P193_SparsityDistMet_YN = 1 And P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN = 1 then
        result = P190_SparsityUnit * (1-(P194_SparsityAveYGSize/P195_SparsityYGThreshold))
        Else
        result = 0
        End if
        End if
        End if
        End if
        End if
ElseIf F100_AllAcademies <> 17181 And FundingBasis = 1  Then 
result = 0
Else
Exclude(rid)
End If
    
    
    Print(Phase, "Phase", rid)
    Print(P190_SparsityUnit, "P190_SparsityUnit", rid)
    Print(P193_SparsityDistMet_YN, "P193_SparsityDistMet_YN", rid)
    Print(P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN, "P196_SparsityYGThresholdMet_YN", rid)
    Print(P195_SparsityYGThreshold, "P195_SparsityYGThreshold", rid)
    Print(P194_SparsityAveYGSize, "P194_SparsityAveYGSize", rid)
    Print(P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri, "P186_SparsityTaperFlagPri", rid)
    Print(P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid, "P187_SparsityTaperFlagMid", rid)
    Print(P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec, "P188_SparsityTaperFlagSec", rid)
    Print(P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru, "P189_SparsityTaperFlagAllthru", rid)
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim Phase As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P185a_Phase
    Dim PriSparsityNotionalSEN As Decimal = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.Primary_Sparsity_Notional_SEN])
    Dim SecSparsityNotionalSEN As Decimal = LAtoProv([datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Proforma_dataset.APT_Proforma_dataset.Secondary_Sparsity_Notional_SEN])
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    
    If AcadFilter = 1 Then 
        If Phase = 1 Then   
        result = PriSparsityNotionalSEN *100
        Else If Phase = 2 Or Phase = 3 Or Phase = 4 Or Phase =5 Then
        result = SecSparsityNotionalSEN *100
        Else 
        result = 0
        End if
    Else
    exclude(rid)
    End if
    
      Print(Phase, "Phase", rid)
      Print(PriSparsityNotionalSEN, "PriSparsityNotionalSEN", rid)
      Print(SecSparsityNotionalSEN, "SecSparsityNotionalSEN", rid)
    
    Return result
End Function

Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim APT_ISB_LondonFringe As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.London_Fringe
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim LondonFringeIandA As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.London_Fringe    
    Dim LondonFringeCensus As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.London_Fringe
    Dim FringeIandAString As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.London_Fringe
    Dim FringeCensusString As string = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.London_Fringe
    Dim LondonFringeCensusTest As Decimal = 0
    Dim LondonFringeIandATest As Decimal = 0
    
    Dim P005 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P005_PriBESubtotal
    Dim P010 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P010_KS3_BESubtotal
    Dim P015 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P015_KS4_BESubtotal
    Dim P022 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P022_PriFSMSubtotal
    Dim P027 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P027_PriFSM6Subtotal
    Dim P033 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P033_SecFSMSubtotal
    Dim P038 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P038_SecFSM6Subtotal
    Dim P044 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P044_IDACIFPriSubtotal

    Dim P056 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P056_IDACIDPriSubtotal
    Dim P062 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P062_IDACICPriSubtotal
    Dim P068 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P068_IDACIBPriSubtotal
    Dim P074 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P074_IDACIAPriSubtotal
    Dim P080 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P080_IDACIFSecSubtotal
    Dim P086 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P086_IDACIESecSubtotal
    Dim P092 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P092_IDACIDSecSubtotal
    Dim P098 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P098_IDACICSecSubtotal
    Dim P104 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P104_IDACIBSecSubtotal
    Dim P110 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P110_IDACIASecSubtotal
    Dim P145 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P145_EAL1PriSubtotal
    Dim P150 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P150_EAL2PriSubtotal
    Dim P155 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P155_EAL3PriSubtotal
    Dim P161 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P161_EAL1SecSubtotal
    Dim P166 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P166_EAL2SecSubtotal
    Dim P171 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P171_EAL3SecSubtotal
    Dim P117 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P117_LACSubtotal
    Dim P133 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P133_PPATotalFunding
    Dim P139 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P139_SecPASubtotal
    Dim P177 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P177_MobPriSubtotal
    Dim P183 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P183_MobSecSubtotal
    Dim P241 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P241_PriLumpSumSubtotal
    Dim P245 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P245_SecLumpSumSubtotal
    Dim P261 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P261_Ex1Subtotal
    Dim AcadFilter As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies

Print(P005, "P005", rid)
Print(P010, "P010", rid)
Print(P015, "P015", rid)
Print(P022, "P022", rid)
Print(P027, "P027", rid)
Print(P033, "P033", rid)
Print(P038, "P038", rid)
Print(P044, "P044", rid)
Print(P050, "P050", rid)
Print(P056, "P056", rid)
Print(P062, "P062", rid)
Print(P068, "P068", rid)
Print(P074, "P074", rid)
Print(P080, "P080", rid)
Print(P086, "P086", rid)
Print(P092, "P092", rid)
Print(P098, "P098", rid)
Print(P104, "P104", rid)
Print(P110, "P110", rid)
Print(P145, "P145", rid)
Print(P150, "P150", rid)
Print(P155, "P155", rid)
Print(P161, "P161", rid)
Print(P166, "P166", rid)
Print(P171, "P171", rid)
Print(P117, "P117", rid)
Print(P133, "P133", rid)
Print(P139, "P139", rid)
Print(P177, "P177", rid)
Print(P183, "P183", rid)
Print(P241, "P241", rid)
Print(P245, "P245", rid)
Print(P261, "P261", rid)
    
    If AcadFilter = 1 then
        If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = 2 ) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = 2) Then       
            If string.IsNullOrEmpty(FringeIandAString) Then
                If LondonFringeCensus < 1 Then 
                    LondonFringeCensusTest = 0
                Else 
                    LondonFringeCensusTest = LondonFringeCensus - 1
                End If 
            Result = (P005+P010+P015+P022+P027+P033+P038+P044+P050+P056+P062+P068+P074+P080+P086+P092+P098+P104+P110+P145+P150+P155+P161+P166+P171+P117+P133+P139+P177+P183+P241+P245+P261)*(LondonFringeCensusTest)
            Else 
                If LondonFringeIandA < 1 Then 
                    LondonFringeIandATest = 0
                Else 
                    LondonFringeIandATest = LondonFringeIandA - 1
                End If
            Result = (P005+P010+P015+P022+P027+P033+P038+P044+P050+P056+P062+P068+P074+P080+P086+P092+P098+P104+P110+P145+P150+P155+P161+P166+P171+P117+P133+P139+P177+P183+P241+P245+P261)*(LondonFringeIandATest)  
            End if 
        ElseIf F100_AllAcademies <> 17181 Then 'And FundingBasis = "Estimate"  Then 
        result = APT_ISB_LondonFringe
        Else
        Exclude(rid)
        
        End if
    else
        exclude(rid)
    End if

    Print(FundingBasis,"Funding_Basis",rid)
    Print(LondonFringeIandA, "LondonFringeIandA", rid)   
    Print(LondonFringeCensus, "LondonFringeCensus", rid) 
    Print(LondonFringeIandATest, "LondonFringeIandATest", rid)   
    Print(LondonFringeCensusTest, "LondonFringeCensusTest", rid)
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P284_NSENSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim APT_NSENSubtotal As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Notional_SEN_Budget
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies
    Dim FundingBasis As  Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim LondonFringeIandA As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.London_Fringe
    Dim LondonFringeIandAString As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.APT_Inputs_and_Adjustments.London_Fringe     
    Dim LondonFringeCensus As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.London_Fringe
    Dim LondonFringeCensusString As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.Weights.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.Census_Pupil_Characteristics.London_Fringe
    Dim Fringe As Decimal = 0 
    Dim P006 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P006_NSEN_PriBE
    Dim P011 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P011_NSEN_KS3BE_percent
    Dim P016 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P016_NSEN_KS4BE
    Dim P028 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P028_NSENFSMPri
    Dim P039 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P039_NSENFSMSec
    Dim P045 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P045_NSENIDACIFPri
    Dim P051 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P051_NSENIDACIEPri
    Dim P057 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P057_NSENIDACIDPri
    Dim P063 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P063_NSENIDACICPri
    Dim P069 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P069_NSENIDACIBPri
    Dim P075 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P075_NSENIDACIAPri
    Dim P081 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P081_NSENIDACIFSec
    Dim P087 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P087_NSENIDACIESec
    Dim P093 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P093_NSENIDACIDSec
    Dim P099 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P099_NSENIDACICSec
    Dim P105 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P105_NSENIDACIBSec
    Dim P111 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P111_NSENIDACIASec
    Dim P156 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P156_NSENPriEAL
    Dim P172 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P172_NSENSecEAL
    Dim P178 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P178_NSENMobPri
    Dim P184 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P184_NSENMobSec
    Dim P118 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P118_NSENLAC
    Dim P134 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P134_NSENPPA
    Dim P140 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P140_NSENSecPA
    Dim P236 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P236_NSENSparsity
    Dim P247 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P247_NSENLumpSumPri
    Dim P248 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P248_NSENLumpSumSec
    Dim P250 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P250_NSENSplitSites
    Dim P253 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P253_NSENPFI
    Dim P262 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P262_NSENEx1
    Dim P266 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P266_NSENEx2
    Dim P270 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P270_NSENEx3
    Dim P274 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P274_NSENEx4
    Dim P278 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P278_NSENEx5
    Dim P282 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P282_NSENEx6
    Dim F200 As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
     
    If F200 = 1 then
    
        If F100_AllAcademies = 17181 Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 And FundingBasis = 2 ) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17183 And FundingBasis = 2) Then  
            If string.IsNullOrEmpty(LondonFringeIandAString) And string.IsNullOrEmpty(LondonFringeCensusString) Then    
                Fringe = 1
            ElseIf string.IsNullOrEmpty(LondonFringeIandAString) Then 
                Fringe = LondonFringeCensus
            Else 
                Fringe = LondonFringeIandA
            End If                        
            Result = (Fringe*(P006+P011+P016+P028+P039+P045+P051+P057+P063+P069+P075+P081+P087+P093+P099+P105+P111+P118+P134+P140+P156+P172+P178+P184+P236+P247+P248+P262))+P250+P253+P266+P270+P274+P278+P282
                     
        ElseIf (F100_AllAcademies = 17182 Or F100_AllAcademies = 17183) And FundingBasis = 1  Then 
        result = APT_NSENSubtotal
        Else
        Exclude(rid)
        End If
    Else 
    
        exclude(rid)
     End if
     
    Return result
End Function

Name: P249_SplitSitesSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim AcadFilter  As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim SplitSiteString As String = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Split_Sites
    Dim ISB_SplitSite As Decimal =  datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Split_Sites
    
    If AcadFilter = 1 Then
        If string.IsNullOrEmpty(SplitSiteString) Then
        result = 0
        Else
        result = ISB_SplitSite
        End If
    Else
    exclude(rid)
    End If
    
    Print(ISB_SplitSite, "ISB_SplitSite", rid)
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim TotalAllocation As Decimal = datasets.Academy_Allocations.AY_2017/18.APT.APT_New_ISB_dataset.APT_New_ISB_dataset.Total_Allocation

    Return result

       If F200_SBS_Academies = 1 then 
        Result = Dedelegation * -1
        ELSE

       End If

    Print(FundingBasis, "FundingBasis", rid)

    Dim P295_Dedelegation As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P295_Dedelegation 
    Dim P001_1718DaysOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P001_1718DaysOpen
    Dim Year_Days As Decimal = 365
    
       If F200_SBS_Academies = 1 then 
        Result = (P295_Dedelegation) * P001_1718DaysOpen / Year_Days
        ELSE
        Exclude(rid)
       End If

    Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies", rid)
    Print(FundingBasis, "FundingBasis", rid)
    Print(F200_SBS_Academies, "F200_SBS_Academies", rid)
    Print(P295_Dedelegation, "P295_Dedelegation", rid)
    Print(P001_1718DaysOpen, "P001_1718DaysOpen", rid)
    Print(Year_Days, "Year_Days", rid)
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: P297_DedelegationRetained
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As String = datasets.Administration.Providers.Academy_Information.Academy_Parameters.Funding_Basis(2017181)
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P295_Dedelegation As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P295_Dedelegation 
    Dim P001_1718DaysOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P001_1718DaysOpen
    Dim Year_Days As Decimal = 365
    
      If F200_SBS_Academies = 1 then 
            If F100_AllAcademies = 17183 then
                IF P001_1718DaysOpen = 365 THEN 
                    Result = 0
                ELSE 
                    Result = (P001_1718DaysOpen - 153) / Year_Days * - P295_Dedelegation
                End If
            End If
            If (F100_AllAcademies = 17181) Or (F100_AllAcademies = 17182) then
                Result = 0
            End If        
      ELSE
            Exclude(rid)
      End If

    Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies", rid)
    Print(FundingBasis, "FundingBasis", rid)
    Print(F200_SBS_Academies, "F200_SBS_Academies", rid)
    Print(P295_Dedelegation, "P295_Dedelegation", rid)
    Print(P001_1718DaysOpen, "P001_1718DaysOpen", rid)
    Print(Year_Days, "Year_Days", rid)
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: ExSubtotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim F100_AllAcademies As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F100_AllAcademies 
    Dim FundingBasis As Decimal = products.1718_Global_Variables.F900_FundingBasis
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P261_Ex1Subtotal As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P261_Ex1Subtotal
    Dim P265_Ex2Subtotal As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P265_Ex2Subtotal
    Dim P269_Ex3Subtotal As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P269_Ex3Subtotal
    Dim P273_Ex4Subtotal As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P273_Ex4Subtotal
    Dim P277_Ex5Subtotal As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P277_Ex5Subtotal
    Dim P281_Ex6Subtotal As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P281_Ex6Subtotal
    Dim P001_1718DaysOpen As Decimal = Products.1718_SBS.P001_1718DaysOpen
    Dim Year_Days As Decimal = 365

    
       If F200_SBS_Academies = 1 then 
            
            Result = P261_Ex1Subtotal + P265_Ex2Subtotal + P269_Ex3Subtotal + P273_Ex4Subtotal + P277_Ex5Subtotal + P281_Ex6Subtotal
             
       ELSE
       Exclude(rid)
      End If

    Print(F100_AllAcademies, "F100_AllAcademies", rid)
    Print(FundingBasis, "FundingBasis", rid)
    Print(F200_SBS_Academies, "F200_SBS_Academies", rid)
    Print(P261_Ex1Subtotal, "P261_Ex1Subtotal", rid)
    Print(P265_Ex2Subtotal, "P265_Ex2Subtotal", rid)
    Print(P269_Ex3Subtotal, "P269_Ex3Subtotal", rid)
    Print(P273_Ex4Subtotal, "P273_Ex4Subtotal", rid)
    Print(P277_Ex5Subtotal, "P277_Ex5Subtotal", rid)
    Print(P281_Ex6Subtotal, "P281_Ex6Subtotal", rid)
    Print(P001_1718DaysOpen, "P001_1718DaysOpen", rid)
    Print(Year_Days, "Year_Days", rid)
    
    
    Return result
End Function

Name: SparsityTotal
Script:
Public Function GetProductResult(rid As String) As Decimal 'change to As String if text product
    Dim result As Decimal = 0 'change to As String if text product
    
    Dim F200_SBS_Academies As Decimal = Products.1718_Global_Variables.F200_SBS_Academies
    Dim P197 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P197_SparsitylumpSumSubtotal
    Dim P198 As Decimal = products.1718_SBS.P198_SparsityTaperSubtotal

    
       If F200_SBS_Academies = 1 then 
            
            Result = P197 + P198
             
       ELSE
       Exclude(rid)
      End If

    Return result
End Function
